Akṛisyus, agellid n Waṛgus, yunag ar Delfi, akken ad iẓer ma yella ad d-yarew aqcic ara t-iweṛten neɣ ala. Yenna-yas-d Uṛaklum : "Keččini, ur d-tettarweḍ, maca yelli-k, ad d-tarrew aqcic ara k-yenYen yiwwass." Akken kan d-yezzi Yer tmurt-is, yekker ugellid Akṛisyus, yerra yelli-s Danayi Yer daxel n tmedwaṛt(1), yerra fell-as tawwurt n wuzzal, yerna yesbded-as iqjan zdat-es, ttqaṛaeen fell-as.
Maca Yas akkenni, Dzus, agellid n idiyusen, yetti d ageffur n wureY, ikcem-as i Danayi, yerra-tt s tadis
... (2871 chars skipped) ... 
i-ines, yettxezziṛ di lemri-ines, almi iwali Medusa. Yekka-yas s deffir, yettxezziṛ-tt di lemri, almi yewweḍ ɣer-s, yerfed afruy, ijelleb fell-as igzem-as aqerru. Medusa, akken kan teɣli, atnad ffYen-d deg dammen-ines imilis Kriẓayuṛ(7) s wefruy n wureY akk d wegmeṛ Pigasus(8) bu wafriwen.
Piṛsiyus, akken kan yeẓra akken, yerf-ed aqerru-nni n Medusa, yerra-t Yer usaku-nni-ines amagi. Stinu d Uryali, ukint-ed. Piṛsiyus yeqqen akaskiḍ-nni n Hades, dɣa yerwel, deg genni s tṣandayin-nni n Hiṛmes.

esace magique. 5) Tigṛatin: du grec Graĩai/Vieilles femmes : Dino, Ényo et Pemphrédo. 6) Aflu/Ifla : Arme(s), du grec Oplon/Arme. Krizayuṛ : Chrysaor, grec ancien Khrysáôr, fils de Poséidon et de Méduse et le frère de Pégase. Il est souvent représenté comme un géant ou un sanglier ailé. 8) Pigasus : du grec Pếgasos, en latin Pegasus : C'est un cheval ailé divin généralement représenté en blanc. Il naît avec son frère Chrysaor du sang de la gorgone Méduse. 9) Tafunust : du latin Funus/Funèbre(s).

Aftis d yiwet n taddart i d yezgan azal n 4 n-ikilumiṭren ɣef uqerru n tɣiwant n Buǧlil deg wenẓul n lwilaya n Bgayet. Taddart-agi tesɛa aṭaṣ n lixṣaṣ, ayagi yeǧǧa imezdaɣ-is ad alin ar wexxam n-useqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw akken at qeflen, imi nerna-n yigna deg tama-agi yenṭaren. Imezdaɣ ssuturen aman, iqudas usizdeg, iberdan, elgaz, lakked ttawailat i yilmeẓyen n taddart-agi. Mači d ttikelt-a tamezwarut i ɣelqen tiwwura n-useqamu n tɣiwant, imi yal tikelt imḍebren waɛden-ten ad frun akk timsal lakk
... (112 chars skipped) ... 
errez, d-acu t-ttuɣal kan ar deffir ! « Nukni ur-d neḍlib ara lmuḥal i yimḍebren n tɣiwant. Aman, iqudas usizdeg, lintirnat i warraw nneɣ, iberdan lakked d lgaz! Mači d-agur isen-d neḍleb! ».I d t-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ n weftis. Taddart-agi xuṣen-tt aṭaṣṣ n tɣawsiwin. Yella aken yiwen n-usenfar n taḍeblit (antenne administratiYe) yebda ɣurres kra n sin isegagsen. Ar ass-a mazal-it ur yekfi ara. Lecɣal dinna ḥebsen ttuɣalen, ayagi yeǧǧa imezdaɣ rfan aṭaṣ. Ma dayen yaɛnan ilmeẓyen, wigi ur ufin ara 
... (112 chars skipped) ...
edmen ixxamen n linternet. Zgan qiment « yessruɣuy-iten » yiṭij n-uebdu! « A sidi, nukni ur ngerrez ara ! Aqla-ɣ newḥel. Lxedma ur tufi-ḍ, addal ulac ttawil, ulac linternet, ulac anda an sɛeddi akud deg taddart nneɣ. Ayagi itt-ḥettim-aɣ akken an ruḥ ɣer Ginduz neɣ ɣer Tazmalt akken an cceḍ deg linternet! ».yenna-d yiwen yilemẓi n weftis. Akka ihi, imezdaɣ n weftis ssuturen deg imḍebren n tɣiwant n buǧlil akken ad rren lwelha ar ɣursen, akken asen-d afen tifrat i yiɣeblan
n taddart nsen.

Zeg wami udfen inecraf n lḥirak ɣer leḥbes d nitni d adaf d ufuɣ deg umenɣi x tseqqar-nnsen. Merra wenn ikkin x leḥbes issen umi qqaren bnadem ad ikkes x macca. Aneḥbus wer ɣer-s ittɣimi bu ca n tebridt nniḍen minzi ɣa isɣuyy x tesɣart-nnes. Mɣar arrimet-nnes. d ta d tabridt i zi ssakk°aḍen imeɣnas tabrat-nnsen i umaḍal. Ittili ijjen unhezzi maḥend ad asen-dd-rxun.
Tabridt-a n tikkest x macca, wadji ɣir Irifiyen i tuɣa tt-itteggen waha. Maca merra imeɣnas ittwaṭṭfen di leḥbusat n tdiktaturiyin d
... (737 chars skipped) ... 
a i t-tuɣa yella di leḥbes. Ila ntaxben-t d aberlamani zi 09 abril ar 05 Mayyu. Immut zegga isseɛda 66 n wussan di leḥbes bla macca. Netta yettwaḥsab deg Irlanda acnaw ijjen umeɣnas d ameqqran yemmuten x tɣawsa n Irlandiyen.
Boby Sans, ttwaggen x-as tnayen n ifilmawen, ijjen qqaren Hunger (2008) issufeɣ-it-id Steve McQueen. Mamec din ijjen ufilm n ddukumunṭir yettwagg x-as qqaren-as : Bobby Sands: 66 Days (2016)
Some Mother’s son
D ijjen ufilm nniḍen i yessawalen x tmeslayt n umeɣni jar Irlanda 
... (737 chars skipped) ...
ga x-as lɛesst ijjen uɛessas qqarn-as Gordon Close. Aterras-a yenjem-d zi lmewt. Di leḥbes tuɣa din amenɣi jar Iprutistantiyen d ikatulikiyen. Xenni ad issen ila mmis yudef la d netta ked IRA am netta. Uca Larry ad ixarres ad igg ca n tarwela d tameqqrant zi leḥbes n Maze. Maca maḥend ad igg manayenni tuɣa ixess-as labudda ad ixzar mamec ɣa igg ad yades ɣer Gordon Close.

Tedwel tḥajit n Bridger (bu setta issgusa di buḥbel-nnes) kessin-tt merra jjurnalat n umaḍal. Aḥenjir-a ig issenjmen weltma-s i x-as imeẓyen zeg ijjen uqzin immuzzar, xenni izeɛf-it weqzin-nni x wudem-nnes ijja dag-s ssikatrisat. Waxxa amenni, iṭṭef deg ufus n weltma-s ar mani i tt-isserwel zeg weqzin-nni.
Bridger inna : « fekkreɣ ila mala ca n ijjen zzag-neɣ ad immet, wer ittili ɣir d nnec ɣa immten deg wemkan n weltma »
Site n "www.lerifain.fr" d ijjen uraq mani nettari s Tmaziɣt waha, dag-s ineɣmisen d merra mayen yeqqnen ɣer tira, aya d tizemmar zeg iḥudriyen maḥend Tmaziɣt n Arrif ad kid-s nennum di tira, ad yemɣar wagra-nnes n tira.

Izem amaziɣ
Izem amaziɣ (Assaɣ ussnan: Panthera leo leo) d yiwet n tedfert n yizmawen inegren deg uzɣar (lexla) deg iseggasen imezwura n tasut tis 20, Izem amaziɣ yella yettidir deg Tefrikt n ugafa llan wid id yeqqaren d akken izem amaziɣ yenger yakk deg useggas n 1940 maca kra n yizmawen llan zeddiɣ (mazal) ttidiren deg kra n telmatin n iɣersiwen d isirken
Izem amaziɣ iga d netta yakk id tadfert tameqrant n yizmawen s wazuk n 180 ar 270 kg (ɣer iwetmen) d 100 ar 180 kg (ɣer twetmin) ayen yettaǧǧan ableɣ-is yudes (teqreb) ar ubleɣ n weksel igan d netta yakk i d aɣersiwameqran deg twacult n tserɣuda, Maca llan kra n imusnawen id yeqqaren d akken ableɣ-is n tidet iga annect n win n tdefrin yettidiren deg unẓul n tneẓruft

D wagi i d isall aqerḍal n umilas deg taɣult n tussna. NASA tger-ed yiwen ineqqis d-yennan d akken aman yellan ɣef waggur ggten yerna llan ɣef wafus, lḥaṣul ugar n wayen akken i yerra wemdan deg uqerru-is ayagi iɛeddan. “Macci d igelmimen neɣ d idɣaɣen n ugris. D tusnifin (molecules) n waman yettuḥeṛṛen gar yiɣisan uḍlisen (sombres) n waggur. »
Snat n teẓra…
Ansi d-kkan waman agi ? « Snat n teẓra et d-yefrurin : Zemren a d-kken seg yizunitran (astéroides), imi wigikana ttɛebbin agris. Neɣ daɣen seg urugen n ion ahidṛujin d-itekken seg yiṭij, m’ara d-aweḍen ɣef waslaḍen ayyuranen, ttalɣen tasnift H2O. » Tilin n waman ɣef wayyur, akken ibɣu yili, d ayen ara yissifsen tudert deg usadur (base de vie) ayyuran.

Asmi ara d-nḥelli Timanit, sakkin Tilelli, ad nebnu ṣṣur aɛlayan, d ṣṣur ara d-izzin i tmurt-nneɣ; Tamurt-nneɣ tamurt n Yiqbayliyen.
Ad nekkest akk assaɣen illan gar-aneɣ akked Yieerbuben s teɣzi n 5 leqrun, alamma dayen ur d-iggri later-nsen, rrkeḍ-nni nsen iḍfin Tamazɣa ur nuklal ammus, di lawan neggar afus i Yimazɣanen iqeṭṭan seg ubeṛṛani i aɣ-icban, sakkin ad nessedrem ṣṣur illan gar-aneɣ, imir ad nezdit, ad nuɣalet d yiwen uɣref, Aɣref Amaziɣ Aferkan, Aɣref n Tmazɣa-nni iɣef urǧin irriẓ urǧin ikni, yudasen si tama n ugmuḍ ill azeggaɣ d ugaraw ahendi, ill agrakal si tama n ugafa, agaraw aṭlanṭi si tama n utaram.
Imiren, newweḍ iswi, nessaweḍ s izen n Masensen ; ad as-nbedd s yiɣerfan iferkanen deg Uxerrub, ad as-nsuɣ ɣef tikkelt :
“Taferka i Yifriqen, Taferka i Yifriqen, Taferka i Yifriqen”.

Deg ubrazil, aṭṭas n imezdaɣ imezwura ttsufran zi lxezrat i ɣer-sen dd-xezzren. Iḥudriyen-nnsen tteggen tizemmar maḥend ad bedden ddegg-a n lxezrat s usxdem n traccwin tinamunin. Ttexsen ad dd-mmlen min ɛnan ad smunen jar leɛwayed-nnsen d tetrart.
« Lḥukuma trezzu ad aneɣ-tneɣ merra ». D wa d awal i yura ij n uḥudri x ifassen-nnes maḥend ad isɣuy kunṭra i isenfaren n ikaryaren i yellan deg wemkan mani izeddeɣ. Aṭṭas n iḥudriyen n teqbilt n Pataksu i izeddɣen di jjihet n Bahiya deg yeffus uẓelmeḍ
... (486 chars skipped) ... 
ul ijjen d taqbilt-nnes maca d tizemmar-nnsen i itteggen i ten-ismunan. Mamec ɛawed ttexsen ad saqaren ividyuten i zi ɣa ssiwḍen tibratin-nnsen x webrid n traccwin tinamunin. Iḥudriyen sxeddamen ividyuten bac ad zemmemen tussna d yidles-nnsen ḥma wer ittweḍḍir.
Zeg iḥudriyen-a nettaf Cristiano Waryu, i yettexsen zi tbadut-nnes x YouTube ad igg ca n imursuten n uvidyu immal-dd dag-sen imxumbal i yettafen imezdaɣ imezwura. Waryu isrusa ca n iseqsan x wagdud Abrazili, iseqsan x min ixes ad yini ad 
... (486 chars skipped) ...
prugramen d usujed n ividyuten. Iqqar « Xseɣ ad saqareɣ ca n ividyuten cnin ; manaya i izemmren ad issiweḍ tabrat-inu d tebrat n waṭṭas n midden zeg wamun-nneɣ. Ass-a 35 alef n yiwdan iḍeffren Waryu x YouTube.
Zeg ij n uɣezdis nniḍen, Alis Pataksu tettegg tizemmar-nnes maḥend ad tessiweḍ leɛwayed d tebridt n tudert n wegdud-nnes i Ibraziliyen. S uya tegga ij n usit i manaya, maḥend ad tari x leɛwayed n wegdud-nnes. Kulci manaya tettegg-it s usxdem n Internet d tebridin titiknulujiyin timaynutin.

Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ad iberreḥ s beddu n teẓrigt tis 3 n warraz n uselway n tegduda n tsekla d tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Asiggez yeldi seg 26 yunyu ar 26 wember 2022.
Attikki deg warraz ad yili s ubrid n usiggez ɣef sit anternet arraz.hcamazighite.dz, timzizzelt terza tismilin n tesnilest, tasekla d tasuqilt, anadi deg tgemmi tarangant n tmaziɣt, d tussna tatiknulujit d wumḍin.
Iwakken ad d-ibeggen udem aɣelnaw n tmaziɣt, asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, yezgan iqeddec deg tɣemmar n tmurt meṛṛa, yefren ad termes Temnaḍt n Tɣardayt tafugla tunṣibt n tukci n warrazen n teẓrigt tis 3, ilmend n tmeɣra taɣelnawt tunṣibt n umenzu n yennayer 2973/2023.

is. Ase3med deg amman yettemcavi ar wental s l macih. Asmi ara defyem seg aman, akken id yuyal lmacih si lmut, di tentel akk tuyalin n sidna 3issa (Romans 6:3-4).
Ase3med ur k-ni ttelikara. Ase3med ur isefdara dnib nwen. Ase3med lmaanas tettayem awal, dasiwel n liman nwen di lmacih akken akniselek. Ase3med ilaq axater davrir n tayit b awal-dasiwel n liman nwen di lmacih ak d lettkal fellas. Ma yella tevyam atettuse3dem, ilaq atthedrem d vav n tejmaat.
English
Sersey ttkal-iw deg lmasih… i tura ?

Anya n walluy aseggasan n uswir n yigarawen, ilan tura azal n 3 n yimilimitren i useggas, yezmer ad yali kraḍ tikkal akken ad yaweḍ ɣer 10 n yimilimitren, akka yal aseggas alamma d d aseggas n 2100, ɣef wakken i d-yedda deg yisefka i d-yeẓreg Comptes-rendus n Tkadimit tamarikanit n tussniwin (PNAS).
Igmuḍen n yimuhal-a ilan azadur yersen ɣef telɣutin i d-sgerwen s yigensaten deg tenzagt n 25 n yiseggasen ‘’simmalla ttmezgin akked tmuɣli n urabul AR5 (i d-snekden deg useggas 2014) n tegrawt n yimazzayen ɣef unezwi n Tuddsa n Yiɣlanen Yedduklen (Giec)".

Timeslayin n usihel
Timeslayin n usihel, ma yili wugur gar yifassen-nneɣ, tewwi-yas-d awarzem (algorithme) i tifrat-is. Awarzem d awalen (n tefransist, tegnizit ..) i yesseqdac wussnan (scientifique) i tifrat n wugur, maca aselkim (ordinateur), ɣur-s awalen-is imaẓlayen, agraw-nnsen d tameslayt n usihel (imeslayen i ifehhem uselkim), wid ara d-isnedhen aselkim ( d azrar n wanaḍen (instructions)) i tifrat. Gar tmeslayin-a:
Awal-a d asewzel (FORmula TRANslation), tisuqqelt n tenfalit, acku awalen-
... (514 chars skipped) ... 
a n wawalen, anelmad yezmer ad yektil: tajumma (surface), ableɣ (volume), azikit (périmètre).atg, neɣ ad ad d-yefru tigdiwin (équations).
Teffeɣ-d ger useggas 1967 d 1971 sɣur Niklaus Wirth. Yefka-yas isem-ayi ilemen-d umussnaw ameqqran BLAISE PASCAL (1623-1662). Tameslay PASCAL tettwassen aṭas seg wasmi i d-teffeɣ i lɣaci tameslayt n Turbo pascal deg useggas 1984, sɣur Borland International, imi wwḍen azal n umeliyun i yettuzenzen seg-s. PASCAL daɣen yemmug-d i tusnakt, yelha nezzeh i yinelmade

base (data base).

Awalen-a zemren ad ilin, d wid n tegnizit mmden, neɣ d asewzel n wawalen n tegnizit.

Cirin Abu Ɛaqla
Cirin Abu Ɛaqla (s taɛrabt : شيرين ابو عاقلة ) isem-is Kamel d : Cirin Neṣri Anṭun Abu Ɛaqla tlul ass n 03 n yebrir 1971 di Lquds (Uṛacalim) , temmut deg wass n 11 di mayyu 2022 deg yigiṭunen n Janin id-yezgan deg wasif n umalu , d taneɣmast tafalesṭinit tamarikanit . Texdem deg ubadu n Al Jazeera i 25 n yiseggasen , seg 1997 armi d 2022. Lmut-is tekka-d mi terza akken ad d-ssugen d acu yellan deg yigiṭunen n Janin , imiren i temmut imi tḥuza-tt terṣast s aqerru . Xminni i dd-njebbed awal x izumal n unhezzi n tlelli tameddant d umeglissaẓur (antiracisme) deg umarikan, ad yili nettat zeg wudmawen i dd-ittasen ɣer taynit-nneɣ aked Martin Luther King.
Man wenn zzag-neɣ i wer yeẓrin niɣ wer yeɣrin yinaw-nnes ittwassnen di tecli i yeffɣen di Washington asegg°as n 1963 d netta isɣuyyu x usnuḥyu aẓuran (discrimination raciale) kunṭra i Imarikaniyen i yellan iẓuran-nnsen zeg Wafrika, mani dag-s yenna taykunt-nnes « I have a dream ».

Maca d manaya i yemsaren nican.
Ukzen ca n imeɣaren n tseqqar timeddanin, deg wakud-nni, x uzellif-nnsen Marten Luther King, ila min imsaren amenni d abrid ixess ad t-ṭṭfen. Zegga temmut di 24 Kṭuber zeg useggas n 2005, yenna-dd ukungris Amarikani ila ixess ad ssersen lxecbet-nnes di lebni n ukapitul, mani inerzaf ẓrint di twalat tameggarut.
Parks ttuɣa-tt d tamɣart tamezwarut taberkant imi ggin assemɣar-nni deg Umarikan.

Tiḥucay i tsaran ifaddaden af tuyat, temalaɣ-d tamzayt i ɣur tsekin.
Seg igur amenzu di tegzirt n Brawnsi asggas n 1907, inaramen tsrussen taḥacits n taklalt af tuyat aken ad nezlef tamzayt iɣur tsekin. Tamzayt n uccayen tsrusun taḥacits n taklalt tazarwalt, tin unemmannu d tawraɣt, igerfiwen d tazgaɣt. inaramen tsrussun ar ass-a tahacits aken ad mlen achu n temzayt i ɣur tsekin.
Iniyen n temzayt sin, amezwar n yinyen isɛa anamek-is, amedya : Tamzayt n Izem iked tin Itbir i snat sɛant iniyen awaraɣ d uzgaɣ, amenzu azgaɣ d awraɣ ma d tis snat d awraɣ d uzgaɣ. Di tḥaciṭs n tuyat amenzu itsɣumu wis sin, ma di tekbabat n temzayt, amenzu i d rif, ma d wis sin i telmast.

Malṭa neɣ Tagduda n Malta (s tmalṭit: Repubblika ta' Malta) d tamurt n Tuṛuft i-d yezgan deg yillel Agrakal, d yiwet seg tmura timecṭuḥin deg umaḍal d tin yesɛan aṭas n yimezdaɣ. Tamaneɣt n tmurt d Valletta, d tin meẓẓiyen gar tmura n Tdukli n Turuft; tesɛa azal n 0.8 km2
Malta tezga di Tefriqt, maca seg unnar n tsertit tezga di Tuṛuft. Ṭelyan d tamurt n Tuṛuft i yeqerben akk, d Tunes d Libya i yellan gar tmura n Tefriqt i iqerben akk.
Tamurt-a deg-s tlata n tegzirin isem-nesent: Malta, Gozo d Kamuna, akked tegzirin ur ttewazdɣnet am: Kamunat, Felfela d St. D Tagzirt n Bulus.
Skudu n Malta yella d tadrimt n temurt ar aseggas 1798, mi tt-beddlen s ujiniyh n Malta, i d-yettwabeddlen deg 1972 ɣer llira, asmi teṭṭef Malta amkan di tedrimt n turuft deg 4 Meɣres 2005, Euro yuɣal d tadrimt taɣelnawt n tmurt seg 1 Yennayer 2008.

Ulac tismin gar tmura. Si tafrent n Ugraw n Urupa (1) n 9 yunyu 2024, di tmura n Urupa akken llant, deg yiwen wass, d tafusit akked tafusit-timeṭṭurfit i yufraren (2). D aḍu amaynut !
Maca nusem nekkni, acku d tifranin n tidet, tid deg ur illi usekkak. D ayen deɣren/fernen medden i d-iffɣen si tebwaḍin. Tameddit n 9 yunyu, ulac awal di yal TV neɣ deg yeɣmisen ɣef kra n usekkak d-illan, da neɣ din. Ulac !
Neqqim d iferraǧen, nẓerr amek teteddu tsertit iwatan di tmura n medden, nessaram azekka ad 
... (577 chars skipped) ... 
 mačči d wid d-yusan si berra akken ad xedmen, ad ččen aɣrum-nsen din ; si zik n zik imdanen teddun si tmurt ɣer tayeḍ, ttinigen, yal yiwen ittnadi ɣef wammud-is, issaram ad yaf tumert-is akka neɣ akkin.
Maca amezruy d inigi : yal tasertit ireglen tibbura, tettawi taggara ɣer ukmim/impasse, ittlal-d deg-s wayen ur nelhi (tirit/racisme, fascisme, nazisme, war taneflit…).
Adabu n tmurt n Lezzayer ur yuɣ abrid n tsertit tafusit, tin ur nekkir i yiwen seg iberdan-nni n tfusit : ifren tasertit tadels
... (577 chars skipped) ...
zzlen, zun illa weḥric-nsen ɣer sdat.
Tamurt ad teqqim di tganit-nni akked layas : « acu teteffzeḍ a Ḥmimi, d llazuq n yilindi », ar asmi ad d-iwwet uḥemmal-nni…

Amyager-a yebda-d deg wammas agraɣlan n yisaragen n Bamako yernu iɛeḍḍel ugar n usrag akken ad yebdu imi ay ssefran ad d-yili waya ɣef tis 11:00 n tnezzayt (akud adigan d wakud n Greenwich). Iɣab daɣ uɣella n Tseqqimt Taɣelnawt i Usukkes n Uɣref, Aknaner Assimi Goita, deg umyager-a.
« Amciweṛ ad d-yili ddaw tselwit n Uknaner Goita, maca war ma yeḥdeṛ », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna yiwen n uɣbalu yudsen ɣer tseqqimt-a.
« Seg wass n 18 Ɣuct ay nebda amezruy d amaynu deg tmurt-nneɣ. Wa d asurif axatar ay yesrin aswingem d alqayan d udraw n wakk yessi-s d warraw n uɣlan », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Malick Diaw, uṭṭun wis sin n Tseqqimt Taɣelnawt i Usukkes n Uɣref, mi yebda umyager-a.
Ugar n 1000 n yimedrawen ara yemlilen deg semmuset n tegrawin yemgerraden i lmend n umciweṛ ɣef tukkit. Deg umyager-a, tewɛed Tseqqimt Taɣelnawt i Usukkes n Uɣref ad terr adabu i yiɣarimen deffir ma tfuk tallit n tukkit, d acu kan, ur d-yettwabder ara wanect ara teqqim tallit-a.

Par DDK | 16 Juillet 2018 | 839 lecture(s)
At Smaɛel
Tikci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren
Thegga-d ddurt iɛeddan tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel yiwet n temlilit i usebɣes n warrac ifazzen seg wid i d-yewwin, s tlemmast igerrzen, ikayaden n taggara n useggas n uɣerbaz amenzu d ulemmas. Yeḍra-d ttiɛad-a, i d-yettwasuddsen i lmend n umulli n tmunent n tmurt n Lezzayer, deg Uxxam n ugraw aɣerfan n Ayt Smaɛel, akked warrac d yibabaten-nsen d kra n yinebgawen. Yewwi-d deg wawal-is uselway n tɣiwant-a iɣef i d-nettmeslay, ɣef umecwar n yinelmaden i d-yettwaɛerḍen, yesnemmer-iten syin yessebɣes-iten ad kemmlen abrid-nsen n tezrawin s wugar n tḥerci d lebɣi. Akken, ɣer taggara, ad ɛeddin ɣer tegnit n tekci n warrazen i wid i ten-yuklalen. Sya ɣer din, ad d-iɛeddi yiwen n yimḍebber n tɣiwant neɣ n twacult, ad imud arraz i yiwen seg yinelmaden. Ayendin d izmummgen i d-yettwasunɣen deg wudmawen n warrac, mi asen-d-yettwahegga usebɣes deg tegnatin am tidak, rnu mmektan-d, am nutni am yibabaten, yeffeɣ leɛtab-nsen ɣer tafat. Ad d-nesmekti d akken deg wayen yeɛnan afmiḍi (pourcentage) n uɛeddi n warrac n uɣerbaz amenzu ɣer ulemmas, yessefraḥ deg yakk taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. Ma yella d wid n uɣerbaz alemmas, yella wanida yuli uswir, yella wanida isubb. Tura yerra uxemmem n yimezdaɣ ɣer yigemmaḍ n ukayad n BAC ara d-ibanen ass n 20 yulyu.
M. K.

Ass Amenzu: 10/01/2017
Asfugel n yennayer di temnaṭ n wehran aseggas-agi yebda ass n 10/01/2017. Ahil d win yebdan deg welmus adelsan Meḥrez lhewwari, d tzeqqa n ssinima LFetḥ.
Timzikkent d tin ara yilin s teɣzi n wussan n tfaska, ad naf deg-s aṭas n tɣawsiwin n lexdami ufus: lfeṭṭa, tiqendyar, talext, idlisen, tiɣawsiwin n wesɣar, nnḥas, lḥelfa, tiɛeljtin d waṭas n tɣawsiwin n tẓuri i d-yersen di temzikkent.
Tasunẓut tella-d ɣef 14:00 s leḥdur uselway n Tiddukla Numidya Mass Ssaɛd Ẓamuc, agensas n srabes n laman d ugensas n lwali n Wehran d umenhal n usalay aɣelnaw Aḥmed Ẓabana. Beɛd mi d-zzin ɣef temzikkent, d temlilit d yemzikniyen,
awal yettunefk i uselway n tiddukla Numidya, yesterḥeb merra s wid d-yusan, yessenmer akk i wid d-yefkan afus n tallelt i tmeɣra n yennayer. Am wakken daɣen i yessarem aseggas ameggaz 2967 i medden merra.
Akken yal yiwen yefka-d awal-is, yessarem aseggas ameggaz, amzun akken msefhamen ɣef yiwen n wawal “ yennayer d win yezduklen merra izzayriyen”, « yennayer d tummast d idles–nneɣ”, ayagi yella-d deg welmus adelsan n Meḥrez Al-Wahrani. Ma yella di tzeqqa n Lfetḥ ɣef 16:00 tella-d yiwet tceqquft n tɛeljtin yettembiwilen « les marionnettes » d-yefka mass Bensoumicha Kada si Sidi Belɛebbas akk d mmi-s, anda i d-yewwi akk tiɛleǧtin sdeffir-s, tɛedda-d Ǧamila Ḥamitu, turar-d terna temla-d tamɛayt
Ahil d win ara ikemlen i wass wis-sin n tfaska ass n 11/01/17.

Yella-d wassaɣ n ticcurka gar Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa akked Tkadimit Tafriqit n Tutlayin mbeed mi d-yerza Dr Lang Fafa Dampha amaray amatu n tkadimit ɣer lemqer n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa deg ussan n tedwilt tis tlata n Tesqamut Tatiqnit Tuzzigt ɣef Yilmeẓyen, Idles d Waddalen i d-yellan deg Lezzayer di tuber 2018.
Asurif amezwaru n ticcurka-a yella-d s uttekki n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa di temlilit n Tesqamut Tussnant-Tatiqnit n Tkadimit Tafriqit n Tutlayin i d-yeḍran di Brazzaville (Tigduda n Congo) deg ass n 3 yebrir 2019 akked temlilit n umcaweṛ i d-yeḍran di Bamako( Mali) deg ussan n 23 d 24 yulyu 2019, rnu daɣen attekki n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa deg tnemselt n umahil d useɣwes i usbeddi n tesquma n tutlayin yettumeslayen beṛṛa i tlisa n tmura: tamharit, taerabt d tmaziɣt i d-yeḍran seg 29 ar 31 tuber 2019 deg Addis-Abeba( Tigduda Tafidiralit n Ityupya).
Deg wayen yerzan tasqamut i yettusbedden i tmaziɣt di Tkadimit Tafriqit n Tutlayin, yewwi-d ad d-nebder attekki n waṭas n yieeggalen izzayriyen seg-sen Prufisur Yusef Nasib i yettufernen d asemyaddas n tesqamut, Mass Si Lhacmi Ɛeṣṣad amaray amatu n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, Massa Nadiya Berdus, Mass Ɛebdella Saddiqi, Mass Ɛebdennaser Geǧiba d Mass Ɛellawa Rabeḥi.
Aten-id uksar-a tlata n walɣuyen i d-yeskanayen attekki n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa deg leqdic n Tkadimit Tafriqit n Tutlayin:

Ǧunger
Ǧunger (アストロガンガー Astroganga) d Animé ɣef super robot. Yeffeɣ-it Knack Productions g 1972 ar 1973 di 26 épisodes.
Taḥkayt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Maya d tafɣakalt (alien/extraterrestre) tunag g l'espace u teɣli af wakal, terwel seg Blasters axaṭer heddmen wemtiweg-ines. Blasters d ifɣakalen, ttakren akk tiɣbula n imtiwgen nniḍen. Maya tezweǧ amussnaw n wakal u sɛan aqcic nnefṣ bnadem nnefṣ afɣakal isem-is Kantaro. Asmi Blasters wwḍen ar akal, Kantaro yufa iman-is yettnaɣ yid-sen s lemɛiwna n Ǧunger, d super robot.
Isem di tutlayin nniḍen[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
- Japanit : アストロガンガ
- Tagnizit : Astroganger
- Taɛrabt : غزاة من الفضاء, mechur s yisem جونغر

Aṭṭas zi mani, ttuɣa ttwalan ila « tawrirt n ibuɣas », amek i ttuɣa i das-neqqar, d raqq mani ittemsar ddenf d tmenɣiwin n lebda.

Ecser
Ecser d yiwet n taddart n 3 252 imezdaY, i d yussan di temnaṭ n Pest, Hungri, s zdat n Budapest
Tizgin[beddel]
Ecser (tettwanṭaq Eččer) tesea daYen isem niḍen asluviki: Ečer, tesdari daYen kra n isluvikiyen. Taddart-a tezga-d deg unẓul-asamar n Budapest, s zdat n unafag agraYlan n Ferihegy. tiYiwanin i as-d-yezzin d Maglud, Večes, Gyumru akk d Ullu. Abrid ameqran n MO yettawi s zdat n taddart. Taddart tussa-d rrif n rraya n tmacint 120a (Budapest-Szulnuk-Ujszasz).
Amezruy[beddel]
lkaYeḍ am
... (42 chars skipped) ... 
i ğember 1315, maca taddart tella uqbel seg 896, di tisin n iHungriyen. Di yiwet n tmacahut, qqaren-d akken isem n taddart yettunefk s Ugellid ameqran n idrumen ihungriyen Arpad. Ass mi yesteqsa anwa i d isem n temnaṭ-a, anda yeḥbes i wakken ad yesteefu, imezdaY n temnaṭ-a ur tessinen ara. DadYa Arpad yenna: "Sya d assawen, ad tsemmim i temnaṭ-a s yisem n ubeluḍ (s thungrit: cser)". Taddart temmut s ddaw uzaglu n Ṭurk ieutmaniyen (1526-1686), ass-mi teYli Buda, ur yebeiden ara aṭas fell-as. Imez
... (42 chars skipped) ...
 1699. llan 11 iserdasen (ieeskriyen) i yettekkan deg umennuY n Rakoczi Yef timmunent (1703-1711). di tazwara n isseggasen 1700, Bab n taddart, lkumt Antal Grassalkovich, yessezdeY deg-s isluvakiyen.
Ayen niḍen[beddel]
Asbad n taddart i yellan, d yiwet-nni Tmesgida takatulikit taṛumanit, yettwabnan di 1740 Yiwen n cṭeḥ afulkluri yettwasnen aṭas d win n "assuli di Ecser" (Noces à Ecser, Ecseri lakodalmas). Di imrigen n taddart ad naf tlata n tYewsiwin mucaeen: tamesgida, cṭeḥ afulkluri d ubelluḍ,

Azekka n Letniyen 10 di Duǧember 2012 ad tilli yiwet n tikli deg Tubirett ɣef 10t n ṣbeḥ.
Tikli-agi heggan-tt-id inelmaden n tesdawit n Tubirett (Muḥend Welḥaǧ ) akked d iselmaden n Tmaziɣt mgal rray i ṭfent tkadimiyin ɣef wayen yaɛnan aselmed n tmaziɣt. Rray-agi d win yerran tutlayt tamaziɣt ɣer rrif, ur d as-fkint ara azal akken i tefkant ama i tutlayt tunṣibt ( taɛrabt ) ama i tutlayin tibaraniyin yettwaseɣren di Lezzayer am tefransist akked teglizit.
Ma yella n muqel s udem unṣib, tamaziɣt d tutlayt TAƔELNAWT. Maca azal-is d asnaɣ (facultatif ) di tilawt; Win yebɣan ad tt-iɣer, wayeḍ fiḥel. Rnu ɣer-s ayen ur fkin ara amuskir id as-ilaqen i tutlayt tamaziɣt.
Ɣef waya tikli-agi ara ad d-yilin azekka d asuter n useqɛed n uẓayer ( statut ) n tutlayt tamaziɣt imi walan belli d nettat I yezwaren ɣef tutlayin nniḍen yettewaseɣren di Lezzayer acku d tutlayt tayemmatt n wegdud.

Lunis At Mengellat
Lewnis AT MANGELLAT, d amedyaz, d acennay i yellan yiwen seg inaẓuren imeẓẓwa ugar (plus populaires) n izwawen. Ilul ass n 17 yennayer 1950, deg taddart n Iɣil Bbwamas ufella n tmurt n Leqbayel ar tama n Micli. Isɛa sdis warrac garasen yiwen d anazur n ccna : ǧeɛfer AT MANGELLAT.

I wakken ad yili useḥbiber d uḥader ɣef tezmert n umdan seg yimihiyen i dittekken seg tcekkarin n plastik i dttmuddun yixebbazen aɣrum-nsen i yimsaɣen, tella-d temlilit n tddukkla taɣelnawt n yimetjaren s lamer n tneɣlaft n tnezzut. Fɣen-d s yisalli ara iḥettmen i yixebbazen akken ad ttmuddun aɣrum di tcekkarin n lkaɣeḍ, imi akken llan xeddmen iseggasen iɛeddan, igellu-d s lemḍerra d umihi ɣef tdawsa n yimdanen.

Aplastik d tifrat neɣ d aɣilif?
Deg tallit ideg nella, yeṭṭef uplastik amḍiq d ameqqṛan deg tudert n yal ass. Armi ṣṣawḍen yimussnawen ssemman-as i tallit-a, tanekkra n uplastik. Lameena aneggaru-a, akken yella d tifrat, i yella daɣen d aɣilf i umaḍal. Meḥsub akken i d-yewwi abaɣuṛ i talsa, i as-dyewwi daɣen ayen i tt-iḍuṛṛen. Amek akka? Seg tama n tifrat, ulac aḥric anda ur yettwasseqdac ara uplastik, anda i yerra yiwen allen-is, ad
... (704 chars skipped) ...
tik, beddlen-tent s tid n lkaɣeḍ.
Ma yella deg tamurt n Lezzayer, ayagi ad yebdu seg yennayer 2020. Ɣef waya,ugar n 100 000 n tcekkaṛin n lkaɣeḍ ara yettwaferqen ɣef 7 200 n lkucat di tmurt. Akken i d-iberreḥ uselway n tfidiṛalit taɣelnawt n yikewwacen. Deg wawal-is, yenna-d belli ilaq ad sneqqsen yimdanen aseqdec n uplastik, ladɣa deg wayen i icudden ɣer tɣawsiwin n lmakla. Am uɣṛum i tetten yiɣermanen s buhan. Daymi i d-yewwi ula ɣef medden ad beɛden ɣef useqdec n plastic s tazzla.
KH. A./K.K.

Imeẓuɣen agenin
Imeẓuɣen agenin (Isem usnan: Plantago lanceolata) d talmest n yemɣi seg twacult n plantaginaceae . Carl Von Linné d amdan amezwaru i yuran fell-as deg useggas n 1753.

Iɛedda lɛid amecṭuḥ deg tegnatin igerrzen seg waṭas n tamiwin, cerhen yimdanen, steɛfan, mɣafaren yiqriben. Seg tama-nniḍen, ldint tḥuna d kra n tnessufar (pharmacies), llan wallalen n usiweḍ, ladɣa deg wass wis sin. Maca, tella-d yiwet n tneqqiḍt berriken i d-yettilin yal mi ara d-zzint tegnatin am ti. Tigi d tiwaɣiyin n ubrid i igellun s terwiḥin yal tikkelt, s waṭas n ssebbat.
Deg Bgayet, kraḍ n twaɣiyin i d-yellan deg wass amenzu n lɛid kan. Tamezwarut, tella-d deg wadeg iwumi ssawalen Ibarisen deg tama n Tuǧa, ɣef 13h30. Tella-d gar snat n tkeryas Mégane d Clio yemyeckaḍen, tessegra-d ṭam n yimejraḥ yenṭerren seg yiwet n twacult. Tawaɣit tis snat, teḍra-d s ufella n tqenṭert n rebɛa n yiberdan yemfaraqen (quatre chemins) deg temdint n Bgayet, ɣef 15h 23. D yiwen n umuṭu i d-nehren sin n yilmeẓyen i d-yeɣlin s ufella n tqenṭert-a, d ayen i yeǧǧan win akken i d-irekben deffir, ad yessuffeɣ tarwiḥt imiren ya. Akken daɣen i d-tella yiwet n twaɣit ɣef leǧwayeh n 15h 37 deg tama n Cap Carbone deg leɛli n Bgayet. D sin n watmaten i d-yeɣlin ɣef ucruf d akessar s wazal n 30 n lmitrat, yiwen yemmut deg wadeg, ma d gma-s wwin-t yiɣallen n uḥuddu aɣarim ɣer sbiṭar ad yettudawi. Ɣef waya, teggar-d tiɣri tenmehla n uḥuddu aɣarim n twilayt n Bgayet s nehhu ladɣa i yilmeẓyen ad zwiren leɛqel, akken ad neqsent twaɣiyin-a i yettaǧǧan ddeqs n twaculin di leḥzen d yimeṭṭi.
Kh. A.

Albums 1988
#20 "Lmut"
#21 "Ṛwaḥ ṛwaḥ"
Deux albums chantés en 1988, dont l'écart de cette date à la nôtre est souvent sous-estimé. Leurs mélodies envoûtantes demeurent ancrées dans la vie des Kabyles, berçant jeunes et aînés avec harmonie.

Mḥend yessaram ad yebnu tamkarḍit ttawesɛant anda ara yeqqar u yerna ad yejmaɛ idlisen-is deg umkan zedigen, ur-ten yettnal ara uɣebbar.

Imi d uɣalen warraw n sen deg uɣerbaz, wehmen, nummen ttafen imawlan n sen ttnaɣen, assen ufan-t-en qqaren, lferḥ ibban ɣef udmawen n sen.
Ula d nutni ɛunden imawlan n sen, dmen-d idlisen, bdan qqaren.
Tuɣal Tasaɛdit tḥemmel ula d netta-t idlisen am M ḥend ne ɣ akter.
Ticki yebɣa M ḥend ad ikke ɛez, ad yesteqsiTasaɛdit:
-“Anwa i tḥemmeleḍ mliḥ d nekki neɣ d idlisen?”
As t-ini d idlisen, dɣa ad yefreḥ Mḥend axaṭer ɣures ulac akk di tudert ayen aɛzizen akter n yidlisen.

As tinid Arifi d trifit ceṭṭḥen x llɣa n Flamenco. Netta ccḍiḥ n Flamenco dag‑s ariḍa, axiyyeq, amenɣi, d waṭṭas n enerji. D manaya yegga ART-6 akd Lina Charif deg uɣennij‑nsen aneggaru.
Aɣennij ullɣen dag‑s deg umezru yn izran, izran ixḍaren‑ten‑dd zi manis wer llin. Tettlaɣa dag‑sen tnixt d taqerɛit x tenni tawaryaɣit. Ttesrid dag‑sn i durar n arif terran‑dd llɣa i redcur.

trennid di ragʷaj
nec xa‑m irezzun
dewleɣ am uzewwaj
Aya llif tesrubid
iwdan xelli mmuten
ma ɛessa d nnic
ai kidek i imunen
Aɣennij‑a n Izran aṭṭas n ifassen dag‑s iswizan, Dag‑s ismawen mɣern akd uɣeẓdis n Lina d Jawad. Said xuttur azlawi, Faḍma ttumlilti taressamt, Meddhy ziouche.
Lxezrat‑inu ɣer uɣennij‑a, ttwariɣ‑t d Beddu n tagrawla n izran di Arif, d twarrit n taynit i min sekʷan izran di tidet, d min kessin d lemɛani, tyacitin, d mamec zemmern ad‑aneɣ ṣṣufɣen zeg usfarnen ɣer uxiyyeq ad‑aneɣ‑dd rren ɛawd ɣer usfarnen. Cnaw ca n tfust n Flamenco di ca n ssaḥet di Andalsiya !

Ačuču
Ačuču: SM. ML. SDM. d'Isem Amalay Asuddim.
- S tfṛansist Pastenague
Qqaren-as akka acku mi ara yetteummu amzun d afrux, amzun d aferfer i yettferfir
daxel n waman. Yekka-d seg uẓar (č). Ur d-nufi ara anamek ines. Ma d awal Ačuču, d aseméi i wawal afrux (čiču).
Ačuču d aslem bu yiYes. Yesea deg teYzi gar sin d tlata n yiYallen (lmitra ar lmitra d wezgzn).
Yemsel am Derqa (uî 43). Iga akk am nettat, ama deg tfekka ama deg talYa;
maca mgaraden deg yiwet: ačuču yesea tisegnit (neY asennan) deg tseṭṭa-s, yerna asennan-agi yeweer,
acku ma yenta-as i wemdan yezmer ad t-ineY.
Yettili deg telqey n yilel, yeggan Yef ṛṛmel; iteddu amzun d aferfer i yettferfir deg waman. Tetten-t medden aṭas,
yerna yegget di tmurt n leqbayel.

Eebdellah Yuela, ijjen zi tarwa n Arrif i yixḍaren ad yefret s yilem-nnes deg ussan n lḥirak n Arrif zegga tuɣa x-as rezzun ad ittwaṭṭef. Tazeddiɣt-nnes di Spanya, wer tejji ca taynit i yettic i umezruy n Arrif ad texsi. Iqqim amenni irezzu, ittbeqqac deg umezruy n Arrif i yudsen.
Deg wass n 21 Γuct, ifsar-dd Yuela x Facebook-nnes, belli yufa ijjen temḍelt di temcant umi qqaren Valdés, di ẓelmeḍ n Spanya. Tamḍelt-a yettwaggen asegg°as n 1936 aked beddu n girra Taspanyut.
Tamḍelt-nni, mala walu tili dag-s jar 400 d 500 n wemḍel, alaḥsab mayen yenna umrezzu, zeg Irifiyen ittwappulsen. Dag-s ula Irifiyen umi neqqar « Arrigularis ». Niɣ ipulisen i tuɣa ixeddmen aked Spanya. Abarru n Irifiyen i yemmuten di garra-nni. Ijjen zzag-sen, yenna-dd deg ijjen ukumunṭir belli jedd-s yettwamḍel di temḍelt-nni.
Yuɛla, yenna eawed ila netta qa issujad ijjen ḍussi x temḍelt, ad ixzar larcif Aspanyu mayen x-as iqqar. Ad immelqa ula aked iwdan itterran taynit i tmkettit n temdint n Valdés.

Imttekkiyen deg umyiger-a i d-yeḍran deg wammas n yimzal ussnanen El Bez ɣran-d i wakken ad temlilt tameqqrant deg wayen yerzan irmuden n tsuda yettmahalen deg uqabel n waṭan-a, amsaka n tiɣɣermi tumḍint yersen ɣef ulday asnatwilan akked uḥareb ɣef tmezgiyin tiɣelnawin akked usinneɣ n yinaw n lkerh deg wanternet s usmaynu awalan n yisaḍufen.
Ɣdebban daɣen ɣef uxatar n uberreḥ azerfan akked usissen i uɣerman n yiḥricen yerzan tinnɣi deg wanternet akked wazalen n uqader tanḍa tadelsant, tasnilsant
... (105 chars skipped) ... 
sensegman akked yimzal.
Imuhal n wass aneggaru n umyiger ḍran-d deg tnemsal tisnetlanin ɣef tetwilin n useji awaculan i umennuɣ mgal takriḍt, titwilin n usmuzget i wakken ad niqrib ɣer yilemẓiyen akked useji n tegrawt mgal n tekriḍt.
Almend n waya, Amsuji Hamza Laazazga n tesdawit n Sḍif-2 yettwali dakken takriḍt yellan deg yinaw n lkerh, n teẓririt akked teẓramnaḍt d ayen yellan d awedani ɣer tmetti tazzayrit yellan deg wansayen-is tettqadar akk isegren-is.
Yerna yettwali daɣen dakken nezmer ad
... (105 chars skipped) ...
n, i d-yesgerwen isdawanen akked yimazzagen n Sḍif, Tabatent akked Qsenṭina, d asmagi n tmentilin n waṭan n tekriḍt, talɣiwin i yes-s d yettban ɣur yilemẓiyin akked tsetratijiyin i yessefken ad ten-neg i uḥezzeb-is, i d-yenna unemhal n Tuddsa n temṣukin n yilemẓiyen (ODEJ), Nacer Fadeli.
Amyiger-a yessuddes-it d acrik gar Tuddsa n temṣukin n yilemẓiyen (ODEJ), tiddukla talɣut akked teɣwalt deg tlemmast n yilemẓiyen akked tnaremt n yisnasen isnimanen deg tlemmast n tkurmutin n tesdawit n Tbatent.

Igzistunsyalizem (niɣ s usmezzeɣ-nnes “iẓriliyan”) d ijjen tebridt n uxarres i yessawalen x tudert d min nettixḍar neccin i yexf-nneɣ.
Min ixes ad yini igzistunsyalizem?
Ixḍar abrid-nnec :
Yeqqar igzistunsyalizem belli tudert-nneɣ nettat : “d min nixḍar i neccin“. Ameknaw n manaya, mala ttuɣa tixḍared ad tirared tcamma niɣ ad teɣred ca n udlis, min tixḍared amenni d manayenni i cek-yeggin ad tilid min xef tellid luxa.
Tilelli d udenni:
Teqqar-aneɣ tafilusuft-a ila neccin d ilelliyen a negg min n
... (1691 chars skipped) ... 
c.
Ili d ixef-nnec: Yettɛawan igzistunsyalizem maḥend iwdan ad ilin d ixef-nnsen, maci ad tegged min tteggen merra yewdan, niɣ ad tegged min zzag-k ttrajan iwdan. D llemliḥ ad tessned min cek-itterran tferḥed, d min ac-icqan i cek.
Min yeɛna ikritiken i das-wcin i igzistunsyalizem?
Aṭṭas n ifilusufen d imxarrsen wcin aberru n ikritiken n igzitunsyalizem, d ina ca zzag-sen:
Aṭṭas n udenni:
Ca n yewdan ttwalan belli igzistunsyalizem yesrusa aṭṭas n ddqel x yewdan, axmi ittwadenna x yiri-nnsen merr
... (1691 chars skipped) ...
in wer nzemmer a newwet leḥsab i kulci min daneɣ ɣa yemsaren di tudert, maca nitni qqaren, ila min daneɣ-icqan aṭṭas d mamec nettemsurruf aked min daneɣ ittemsaren amenni.
Ɛawed; ttwalan ila izemmer bnadem ad yili d agzistunsyal, maca di twalat d icten d netta ittegg leɛwayed i yellan deg wamun-nnes niɣ ittamen deg ixarrisen i t-ittɛawanen ad yiɛic mliḥ.
Aked uyenni, ttwalan belli zemmren ad qqnen igzistunsyalizem aked ixarrisen-nniḍen i yettunuḍen maḥend ad afen tabridt n tudert i dasen-ilaqen.

Tuɣa ixzer mliḥ di jjihet n Tcipas deg yeffus n Miksik. Ixezzer deg imezdaɣ n wemkan-a wanita, i ttuɣa yellan zeg waydud n Maya. Lxezrat-a tanita tzemmer ad tili s tiṭṭawin n ijjen wergaz. Argaz-a iyreḍ ijjen mask, ttbanent-id ɣir tiṭṭawin-nnes tterqriqent. Nessawal da x Rafael Sebastián Guillén Vicente. Aterras-a idwel isem-nnes ɣer Lqayed awadday n Guillén. ... (370 chars skipped) ... 
elli-nnsen, aked uɣezdis n weɣrum. Ikka ibriden uɛaren s waṭṭas d netta ibedd deg wudem n uqabu isxeddamen imḍebbaren. Ar mani wami ixḍar isem-nnes, inna ad iggernez x ismawen n imḍebbren. Iggernez x yisem n « lqayed i yuɛlan ». Netta ixḍar isem n lqayed awadday d netta aqqa-t x yixef n tenbaḍt n lɛesker d useyyasi.

Ayen yeṭṭfen lwelha ass-nni n usmekti n tmettant n Lwennas Matub d tirza n waṭas n yilmeẓyen d yimecṭaḥ Yer tewrirt n Mussa akken ad d-ẓuren azekka-s d uxxam-is. Amur ameqqran n wid i d-yusan deg-sen werğin ur twalan sdat-sen imi llan d igerdan deg useggas n 1998, aseggas n tmenYiwt-is. Ssnen-t kan s wayen yecna d wayen nnan medden fell-as.
Xas eeddan 15 n yiseggasen Yef tmettant-is meena mazal ttasen-d yimdanen s ṭṭaqa am wakken i d-rezzun deg yiseggasen-nni imezwura. Ass-nni n 25 deg yunyu ieeddan, ussan-d ihi seg yal tama n tmurt : ussan-d seg Bgayet, Tubiret, Bumerdas, Lezzayer tamanaYt, Batna, Blida, Jijel, Wehran d Ṣtif…atg ; Rznan-d ula deg Lmaruk imi llan deg-sen wid yekkan deg temsizzelt-nni n tmedyazt. Yal win i d-yusan u uqbel ad yaweḍ s axxam n Lwennas, yeḥbes deg Tala B-wunan i wakken ad yessers tameqqunt n yiseğğigen deg umekkan amcum anda i t-nYan syin ad ikemmel Yer Tewrirt n Musa. Di kra n swayee kan, seg Leacra d ttasawent, yuYal ubrid Yer uxxam n Lwennas yenfeḍ s tkeryas, ayen yeğğan imdanen ad kemmlen amecwar nsen Yef uḍar.
Tameqqunt n yiseğğigen sersen-tt s wudem unṣib Yef lweḥda d uzgen. Ḥedren aṭas n wudmawen n tsertit d yimḍebbren n tama-agi n Leqbayel Yer tama n yemma-s d uletma-s. Ma dayen yeenan temsikent, yella-d ujdid aseggas-a imi walan wid i d-yerzan llebsa d wallalen n lmusiqa n Lwennas i tikelt tamezwarut.

Aemar Uḥadda d yiwen unaẓur ameqqran aqbayli. D yiwen gar imezwura n Rradyu n Teqbaylit. D acennay, yexxdem taYen amezgun n ṭaḍsa s Teqbaylit.

Abrid-is di tẓuri[beddel | edit source]
Deg usegwas n 1942 yettiki d adrabki deg tarbaɛt n Meẓyan Buseksu. Yurar akw d Waerab, Muḥuc.
Asmi yuden Ccix Buseksu dYa yeṭfi-tt Aemar Uḥadda.
Deg usegwas n 1945-1946 iṛṛuḥ ar tedwilt n Ccix Nurdin iwakken ad yeccnu s teqbaylit.
Deg usegwas n 1948 iṛṛuḥ ar Fransa anda yeccna.
Yexxdem akw d Ccix Nurdin, Amrawi Missum, Ccix Aerab Awzelag, Yusef Abǧawi
Yexxdem ama tuYac ama d amezgun s teqbaylit ( Taccequft umi isemma taqbaylit deg usegwas n 1981). Yesker daYen "les sketchs" : Yefraḥ yezweǧ, Aemar di ssuq (1985), Aemar di la cite, Aemar di Remḍdan.

Iga s ism nns imdan: Niccolò di Bernardo dei Machiavelli (ilul d ɣ 3 mayyu 1469 – immut ɣ 21 yunyu 1527) iga yan urgaz g Fluransa, ig adiblumas d umara d uflsuf d umassan n umzruy da iddrn ɣ tallit n Usnflul n Iṭalya. Ittyawssan uggar s udlis nns asrtan Agldun (*Il Principe*), da ittyaran ɣ 1513 macc ur d iffɣ ar 1532, smmus isggʷasn dffir lmut nns. Ar as bahra aqqran s "bab n tflsuft tasrtant tatrart d twssna tasrtant".

Takirgizit
Tutlayt takirgizit d nettat ay d tutlayt taɣelnawt n Kirgizistan, yernu ttmeslayen-tt wazal n 2 n yimelyunen n medden, Ikirgiziyen. Di tmura ay d-iqerben Kirgizistan llan diɣ waṭas n wid ay tt-yettmeslayen. Di lweqt i deg llan 150.000 n medden ay tt-yettmeslayen di Ccinwa, ladɣa di tama tafulmant (autonome) n Sinkiang-Uiɣur, llant diɣ waṭas n trebbaɛ timecṭaḥ n Yikirgiziyen ay tt-yettmeslayen deg wetram (lɣerb) n Mungulya, di Kazaxestan, di Taǧikistan akk d Uzbikistan. Di 1919, tuɣal Kirgizistan d aḥric si tegduda tanemlayt (socialiste) tasuvyatit n Turkman, sakin, di 1936, tuɣal d tagduda i yiman-is, d yiwet si xmesṭac-nni n tegdudyin n Tdukli Tasuvyatit. Deg wass n 31 ɣect n 1991, tuɣal Kirgizistan d tamurt timziregt, u tuɣal d tamaslaḍt (membre) di Tmetti n Yiwunak Imzirgen (Communauté des Etats Indépendants) ay d-yettusbedden mbeɛd ma teɣli Tdukli Tasuvyatit.

Ṣenneṭ i ȓebƹaḏ n lʼayaṯ zi ssura umi qqaren Imezwura zeg wuḏem wis 6 aȓ 9. Ṯessawaȓ x Arebbi wami imḥa iwḏan x ṯmurṯ ḏi ȓiyyam n Siḏna Nuḥ, ṯtarjem ḏanita s ṯmaziɣṯ n Arrif, iƹni ṯarifiṯ.
Ɣer ḏanita x uɣarrabu igga Siḏna Nuḥ ƹlaḥsab awaȓ n Arebbi, ḏeg wuḏem wis 6 zi lʼaya 11 aȓ 22: Ikṯar ccerr ḏ lfasad ḏ imenɣan x ṯmurṯ qibač i Arebbi. Tuɣa xmi ixezzar Arebbi ɣar ṯmurṯ itwara-t ṯƹemmar s lfasad ȓaḥeqqac tuɣa iwḏan marra ffɣen abriḏ. Inna-as Arebbi i Nuḥ: "Yiweḍ ukemmaȓ n marra min iddaren ḏi ddunect ȓaḥeqqac iwḏan ccuren ṯamurṯ s imenɣan. Ƹlaḥasab manaya aṯen mḥiɣ niṯni ḏ ṯmurṯ. Egg i yixef nnec ij uɣarrabu s ukeccuḍ n ȓcejjur iy ṣebḥan, ṯeggeḏ aɣarrabu ḏ ṯizeddaɣ, dhen-iṯ s barra ḏ ḏaxeȓ s ṯizefṯ. Ha mamc ḏas ɣa ṯeggeḏ: Egg ḏayes miyya u xemsin mitru ḏi ṯuzeggwarṯ, xemsa u ƹicrin mitru ḏi ṯiriwt, xemmesṭac mitru ḏi ȓuƹȓa. Egg ṯizeqqa n uɣarrabu ṯejjeḏ taman n uzyen mitru jar ṯzeqqa ḏ ssarjem, egg x yij n jjihet ṯawwarṯ. Ṯeggeḏ ḏayes ṯȓaṯa n ṯzeddaɣ icten x ṯenneɣnit. Nec aqa ggureɣ aḏ ssekkeɣ ȓfayaḍan n waman ɣar ṯmurṯ bac aḏ qḍiɣ marra uw iǧa arruḥ, ḏ marra min iǧan x ṯmurṯ aḏ immeṯ. Maca cek, akic ggeɣ ȓƹaheḏ uca aḏ taḏfeḏ ɣar uɣarrabu cek, ḏ ṯarwa nnec, ḏ ṯemɣarṯ nnec, ḏ ṯemɣarin n ṯarwa nnec.
Itxeṣṣa-cek akiḏec ṯsiḏfeḏ ḏeg uɣarrabu ṯiyuya zi marra lḥayawan awṯem ḏ ṯewṯemt, ḥima aḏ qqimen uȓa n niṯni iddaren. Ṯawiḏ? akiḏec zi marra lmakla itwaccen, xemmeȓ-it ɣarek ḥima aḏ tiȓi ḏ lmakla i cek ḏ lḥayawan." Uca igga Nuḥ marra s min zi ṯ yumar Siḏi Arebbi.

Umi qqaren leḥriq n beṭṭu?
Amen niɣ wer ttamen: Awarni beṭṭu s imeṭṭawen, tettɣima tyacit s tmexsa waxxa amenni. Ahurmun n dopamin mala twezned-t ɣar yenni yemṣebḍan, ad tafed am yenni i yallah ɛad bdan ad xsen aya wya
... (2469 chars skipped) ... 
ayri tzemmer ad tili d ijjen walarm teggit tnefsit‑nneɣ. Teqqar‑as i taddut: Beṭṭu‑ya ad cek-yessehlek, xzer mamek ɣa tegged wer ttemṣebḍiḍ. D manaya itejjan lebda nteṭṭef s teɣmas di wi nettxess waxxa qqnent tewwura marra.
zeg ijjen uɣeẓḍis nniḍen ttraḥen ca n imussnawen ɣer trezzut deg uydud. Qqren belli tanefsit s uxeyyeq‑nni. Trezzu wi das ɣa yewcen werha, ad das-yesḥinneb. Manaya qat la ɣa ca n yekluṣa n iɣerḍayen, ufin tettek xaf‑sen leḥriq n beṭṭu.
Min ittɛawanen x leḥriq n beṭṭu?
Mala ne
... (2469 chars skipped) ...
ɣ ca n lhiwaya n jdid izemmer ad iɛawen ɣa wgenfu zi beṭṭu.
Beṭṭu zi beṭṭu, nssiwel x beṭṭu n tmexsa, neccin irifyyen niweḍ necca bunajuf, nzemmer ad t-neḥseb d ijjen uklaṣi n ucarh‑iman. Niweḍ ad negg lmunker deg ixf-nneɣ, ad negg lfuyun di tmeɣriwin …, Beṭṭu zi beṭṭu, zi mani nella neccin di beṭṭu, akd tmurt, lwadjay, imeddukal, d llif. Ca n twalatin tmunan‑dd, uca aqqa-aneɣ ɛad da, nbedd am ijjen nhar. Suya wer ttenqiḍ. Ad teggenfid cḥal mma tekkid.

Ludufiku di Firrari (s Tṭalyanit: Lodovico de Ferrari) (2 brayṛ 1522 – 5 ktubeṛ 1565) ikka t inn iga yan umusnak awṭalyan.

Ilul-d g Bulunya, issnta "carrière" nns am umawas dar Jirulanu Kardanu. Tuman dar Ludovico yat tḥṛci icwan kigan, ayann af iɣts Kardano ad as isslmd tusnakt. Ittawssan s ufrru nns i tagda "kwartik", nna ifsr Kardano ɣ warra nns Ars Magna. Ɣ tɛurrma nns, iɣiy ad yamẓ yat tsɣnt n usslmd ilan atig ɣ Ṛuma, ḍart mad yumẓ gis Cardano tanaft nns ismmt
... (205 chars skipped) ... 
usnakt ɣ tɣiwant n Bulunya asggʷas 1565, maca ḍart uynna s yan imikk, immut s ustci n uzrnix umlil (white arsenic), f uynna ittini umata; ultmas ad d ikka lḥal.[2]

Nadya Benmuhub
Nadya Benmuhub, d tamyarut, d tamedyazt d tameɣnast n yedles. Temmut s waṭan n wul, ass n 27 tuber (mrayur) 2002, meẓiyet di leɛmer-is kan 33 isegwasen. D aṭṭan i t zuɣur yid-s si 1990. Tella tezdeɣ deg Iwaḍiyen, lameɛna aẓar-is si taddart Zaknun i d-yezgan deg At Wasif. Yemma-s Lǧuher d baba-s, yettwasnen s yisem n Muḥuc, d imedyazen ula d nitni. Baba-s d accenay daɣen, yettasen di talit-nni n 60/70/80. Nezmer ad nini belli d tawacult tqedec aṭas af yedles Amaziɣ, imi ula d weltma-s Lwiza d nettat i yellan deffir n tesɣunt Tin Hinan ur d mazal tura.
Wid i snen Nadya Benmuhub di Tizi Wezzu, anda tella d tanelmadt, tella d ttin urǧin ur tḥebes si tazla deffir uqedec af yedles: ama d tira, tacuquft umezgun, isefra, ... Tella tezga deg uxxam n yedles At Mamer di Tizi Wezzu.
Lehdur ineggura i d-tenna Nadya Benmuhub i yemma-s, uqbel ad taweḍ tisureft n yakuc, d widi:
- A yemma aɛzizen ur ttru
- Ttxil-m ṣber ur ttxaq
- Yal yiwen laǧel-is ad yeddu
- A ma meqqer a ma leqqaq
- A m-d-yazen ddwa ḥellu
- Akken i ɣ-d-yuzen lfiraq

Igeɛɛed nnumru n yenni i yelqef lehlak n Kuruna ɛawed, ula kṭer di tmura n Uruppa, ca zzag-sen ksin merra baqunat-nnsen. Manaya yejjin ca zi tmura Tiruppawyin ad beddent x baquna tis tlata kunṭra i ubirus-a wa.
Maca waxxa azgen ameqqran n inni i telqef Kuruna wer ggin ca baquna, maca Aliman iqqar belli ixess ca n midden ad ksin baquna tis tlata, ammu i d-inna ujurnal n Stuttgarter Zeitung.
Manaya zeɛma minzi baquna wer tettic ca n uḥeṭṭu ikmel zeg ubirus, min ɣa yejjin aṭṭas n inni i yeggin baquna a ten-ilqef lehlak-a, ɛawed « tiɣist » n baquna-ya tneqqes aked lweqt, alaḥab ajurnal-a lebda.
Maca melmi ɣa ksin iwdan baquna tis tlata ?
Alaḥsab tawzirt n seḥḥet Talimant, teqqar belli ar ɣa teɛda settchur zi tnayen n baqunat i ca n bnadem tili ɣer-s 12 iseggusa. Maca, mala teggid baquna, qbel i settchur, ataf wer ɣer-s bu ca n lfaydet d tameqqrant, minzi bnadem mala yegga tnayen n baqunat, ataf yeksi tizemmar n uḥeṭṭu zi lehlak-a.
Tawzirt n seḥḥet Talimant twessa bac ca n iwdan ad zzag-sen ssizzaren ad ggen baquna tis tlata awerni settchur n baquna. Ameknaw iwessura s nnej i sebɛin ɛam, d inni ɣa yella nnaqes di lmanaɛa d inni ixeddmen di spiṭarat d tsentutin ittsunen iwessura.
Lux, deg Uliman, wer tteggen bu bezzez x midden bac ad ggen baquna.
Maca qa tawriqt n baquna, ɣer Ilimaniyen tselleḥ asegg°as ikmel i tnayen n baqunat waha. Ar lux, wer ssinen Ilimaniyen cḥal ɣa iqqim lḥal ammu, manaya zemmren ad t-ssnen deg wussan i d-igguren.

Mayen umi qqaṛen “tilelli”? Tilelli tella xminni (asmi) afgan yettegg mayenma yexs maca asel ma yessekma (iḍarr) tudert en midden niɣ yekref tilelli nsen ad ggen mayenma xsen.
Tilelli: egg mayen texsed, sker ma trit, maca ejj iwdan (midden) ad ggen niɣ ad sekren mayen xsen, aha wer ttaḍes (wer ttmessa) tudert en midden. Xminni (asmi) afgan ila tilelli nnes ad yegg mayen yexs, netta yettili yezmer ad yaf tumert nnes aha ad yaweḍ (ad yelkem) ɣer tudert ay yexs i yixef nnes ed yiman ines.
Kkoẓt en 
... (1875 chars skipped) ... 
jaḥt) ed tdamsa tilellit, urid (maci) deg ufus en Eřmexzen . Eřmexzen wer izemmar i ca ɣas ajraw en tiwsi (eḍḍariba). D-ta d-tidett tameqqṛant.
Imelyunen ed yimelyunen en Yimeɣrabiyen yettettaren tawuri zi Eřmexzen wer tet ttifen waxxa qqimen ssuggumen (ttṛajan) tudert nsen amen temda, minzi (acku) Elmexzen wer izemmar aha wer yessin.
Yezmer Elmexzen ad yesmijjel (ad iweḍḍef) 1% niɣ 5% di-sen es yiqaṛiḍen ed yidrimen ay yejrew es tewsiwin (eḍḍariba) nnes, maca Elmexzen wer izemmar ad yesmijjel 1
... (1875 chars skipped) ...
 tewsiwin (asenqes di eḍḍariba) niɣ tikkest en tewsiwin d-ayen yucclen i Yimeɣrabiyen ad ttaren zi Elmexzen. Idrimen ed yiqaṛiḍen yettɣiman di ejjibb nnec (di ogoḍil nnek) d-ayen yellan d-tilelli nnek minzi cek řexdenni (ɣakudann) tettilid d-ilelli di tudert tadamsant nnec aha tzemmared ad tegged es yidrimen nni ayenma texsed.
Xminni ɣa remsen (ɣa fehmen) Yimeɣrabiyen ed Yimaziɣen tidett en tlelli iwa řexdenni (ɣakudann) zemmaren ad ddaren tudert nsen amec xsen.

D adlis aqdim i d-uran iqeddacen n Dawed d yemyura nniḍen i yɛerḍen a d-snejmaɛn meṛṛa tiẓilla d ccnawi. D izlan i s icennun tayri n Ṛebbi d leslak-ines i d-yefka i wid yumnen yis, itteklen fell-as. Ar aas-a timezgidiwin meṛṛa deɛɛunt cennunt s “Ihellilen”. Tikta n ihellilen s umata, d taẓallit d leḥmadi. D aɛenni ɣer Yillu. Azal-nsen di Tira d alemmas. Sseǧhaden di liman rennun-as deg afud.
Azal n 150 n ccnawi d isefra. D icewwiqen n ṛṛuḥ. Ttalin-d deg ulawen n wid meṛṛa yettḥemmiden tamanegt n
... (667 chars skipped) ... 
i i Yillu. Deg ul n tugett n ihellilen-agi, ad ilin wid ara d-yegren tiɣri ɣer wazal n Lmasiḥ. Deg-sen am akken d licarat i Lmasiḥ-nni ara d-yasen i leslak n yemdanen. D tiɣri i leslak-nni i d-yewɛed Ṛebbi i wat Israil, yerna ara yilin daɣen d leslak i yegduden n ddunit meṛṛa.
Asirem n ihellilen !
Iban-d Lmasiḥ ɣef d-ttawin ihellilen d agellid (Ahellil 2). Ḥekkun-d ula ɣef leɛtab ara yenneɛtab ara yettwaqher ( Ahellil 22, Ahellil 44). Amedya n uhellil wis 16, deg-s awal ɣef lmut d ḥeggu n Lmasiḥ
... (667 chars skipped) ...
llan d amsellek.
Ayagi ad aɣ-yawi iwakken ad ǧǧuǧgent deg-nneɣ tissas, a nesbed asirem deg ulawen-nneɣ. Imi tiɣri n ihellilen i d-icergen leqrun d zzman, d tin n ḥeggu n Lmasiḥ. Yebna wayagi deg umezruy. D ayen ɣer ssaramen imezwura. Imi tidyanin n ihellilen d tid-nsen. D tiswiɛin deg ttidiren. Ama d lferḥ ama d lqerḥ. D anezgum d ixemmimen, d lehna neɣ d ṭrad. Di yal taswiɛt tiẓilla n ihellilen deɛɛunt ɣer leslak ara d-iceggaɛ Yillu i wegdud-is. Ma nessaked, Ihellilen d asirem d tiɣri n leslak.

Isenfaren-iw, sin wungalen yiwen yekfa ad yeffeɣ deg wagguren i d-iteddun, azwel-ines Tawenza Umesbrid. Ma yella d wayeḍ, qrib ad yekfu azwel-ines Tizwal Uɣerbas. Akken neẓra, addad n tesdawiyin di Lezzayer s umata, ama si tama n tneflit neɣ n uswir, ur yelli d win yessefraḥen. Lexsas i n-yellan, yeǧǧa isdawanen imiyupaten abeɛda, d yimeɛḍar s umata, ur ttafen akk iman-nsen di tesdawiyin imi weɛrent tegnatin ideg ɣɣaren, neɣ ideg gganen daɣ. Ulac ama d tadrimt i ilaqen, ama d amɛiwen n tudert tinmettit (AVS), ama d iberdan i wawwaḍ (accessibilité), ama d ttawilat-nniḍen i asen-yettarran liḥala teshel di tesdawit, neɣ di tnezduɣt tasdawant. Dɣa, iseggasen-a ineggura, llan yimiyupen i yessawḍen rzan ɣer Fransa, ttkemmilen akka tura tizrawin-nsen dinna. Ahat ad d-nebder win ifersen abrid deg, Lbacir Buqir, mi yunag ɣer Fransa ikemmel tizrawin-

id Igi d Crif i yusan aseggas-a kan. Am wakken terza Ḥayat Benkerru i d-yewwin duktura di tsenselkimt ayyuren-a yezrin. Seg-sen, yella daɣen Talbi Farid i yunagen mačči aṭas-aya. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ttaɣen di Fransa armi azal n 900 n yiyuruten, rnu sɛan azref i umɛiwen 4 n yisragen i wass. «D asḥissef mi ara nwali liḥala n yimiyupaten-nneɣ di tmurt-nsen. Yiwen wass izem inced-d imeddukal-is, deg-sen illa weɣyul, uccen d uvaṛaɣ* ɣer yefri* illan d tamezduɣt-ines. Vdan ttmeslayen gara-sen, awal yettawi-d wayeḍ armi i d-wwḍen ar uxxam n yizem. Dɣa yesseqsa-ten yizem amek, d acu i walan deg uxxam-is. Isseqsa amezwaru deg inebgawen nni, inna :
Izem : Kečč ay aɣyul d acu i twalaḍ ?
Irra-yas weɣyul :-Axxam-ik ilha xas akka d ifri, ur tettḥulfuḍ deg-s i wsemmiḍ deg tegrest neɣ i weẓɣal deg unebdu. D acu kan txuṣ-it tabenda* n ijeǧǧigen imi yettraḥ d imurḍusen nni i tetteḍ.
Izem yerra-as-id :-Yaaah ! D axxam am wagi i yettfuḥen d imurḍusen ! Yezzi ar ɣer-s,yewwet-it, yenɣa-t. Imuqel ɣer wuccen, yerra-as :
Ay izem ay agellid n tẓegi, axxam-ik ittriḥ d tafenda n ijeǧǧen n tefsut. Leḥyuḍ-is ttemsirqin am tafat n yiṭij.
Izem yerra-as : -avudu am wagi teqqareḍ iyi-d d ṣraya, yecveḥ yernu zeddig ?! Idewwer ar wuccen, yewwet-it yenɣa-t. Idewwer ar ubaṛaɣ inna-as ula i netta : -I kečč ay abaṛaɣ, acuɣer akka i teggugmeḍ. Ini-yi-d d acu i twalaḍ ?
Abaṛaɣ iwala iman-is deg tcebbakt, ur yelli wamek ara isellek iman-is. Ixemmem kra kan irra-as i yizem :-Suref-iyi ay izem, ass agi ur zmireɣ ara a k-iniɣ d acu i walaɣ, allen-iw ttemcullaɛent wallen-iw acku yewwet-iyi waḍu*, ur zmireɣ ara ad sriḥeɣ neɣ ad waliɣ. Yerra iman-is metwal n tuffɣa n yefri kan iẓelkeḍ ikcem ar teẓgi.

Tazalɣi Copley
Tazalɣi Copley d yiwen waraz deg taɣult n tussna. D tazzlɣi yesɛan azal ameqṛan sɣuṛ Royal Society (Londres), d nettat id taqbuṛt ark, tellas i tikkelt tamenzut aseggas n 1731. Tazalɣi-yagi tennulfa-d seg-mi i yefka Mass Godfrey Copley i Royal Society 100 £ aseggas n 1709, Mass Copley d yiwen umaṛkanti yesɛan tamurt di Doncaster deg unẓul n Yorkshire, yuɣal y ufren d amaslad n tmetti-yagi aseggas n 1691.
D yiwet ger mraw n tzalɣiwin it ttak Royal Society, kra yuɣal semmet. Tazalɣi Copley ttaken-tt di tsengama, d Tussna n tudert.

Taẓuṛi tamaziɣt
Taẓuṛi tamaziɣt tga yan iger bahra istawhmman g Tmazɣa.
Ssinima[ssnfl | Snfl asagm]
Ɣr uggar f Ssinima tamaziɣt
Ssinima tamaziɣt tga tt ssinima lli ittuysawaln s tutlayin timaziɣin, tbda ɣ ugafa n tfriqt ɣ tmazirt n Lmɣrib ɣ lbdya n 90's ɣ tasut tis 20, ɛad ad tbayn ɣ tmazirt n Dzayr ɣ uzmz ad nit. Tkka-tt-inn tuddma nɣ lbidaya n ssinima tamaziɣt ɣ tmazirt n Sus ɣ usggwas n 1991 ɣ Lmɣrib s lfilm lli akk izwarn n tutlayt taclḥit ad tt igan " Tamɣart n Wurɣ " lli d issufɣ ssi Ḥasan Bizikarn, d awsn gis kigan n inaẓurn imaziɣn. Isawl d ifilm ad f kigan n tɣawsiwin gisn tamagit d wakal d waddur. Iḍfart nit ɣ usggwas n 1992 film lli akk ittawssan ɣ ssinima taclḥit d tamaziɣt, ad t igan lfilm n " Bu-tfunast " lli d isnkrn yat tgrawla imqqurn ɣ ssinima tamaziɣt s umyawas n ssi Muḥammad Baɛmran d ssi Ḥasan Ibuka. Iḍfart ula ntta lfilm n " Gar Timɣarin ", ɛad ad ackin kigan n laflam yaḍni.

Ifisdayas ( s tegrigit taqburt : Yφισtaίaς (Iphisdaias) ) d yiwen n umaziɣ yedduklen d yibizenṭiyen di tallit n tegrawliwin timaziɣin mgal ucengu abizenṭi . D baba-s n yiwen qqaren-as Bitibtan yella d aqerru ɣef yiwen n udrum amaziɣ , imi si zik yeddukel d Bizenṭa yewwi aɣara n " Praefectus gentis "
di tegrest n 546/547 itekka di tuffɣa n ujiniral Jan trujlita d tnegluft i yɣeḍlen agrawliw Antalas . Di taggara n 547 /tazzwara n 548 , yemgarad d umeddakel nniḍen n yibizenṭiyen d Kusina maca mluɛan ardekal mi send-iceyyeɛ Jan trujlita aserdas qqaren-as Yuwanis ( isem-is d Jan ula d netta s tutlayin n Turuft n wass-a ) . Di tefsut n 548 yella-d gar yiqerra n yiserdasen n Jan trujlita mgal yigrawliwen si daxel n yiserdasen ibizenṭiyen itekka ula di tnegluft n yiḥerqan n Katun .

Tycho Brahe (asusru ) neɣ Tyge Ottesen Brahe, illul ass n 14 dujember 1546, yemmut ass n 24 tuber 1601 deg Prag, d amassan n tasnallunt laṣel-is adanmaṛki[1].

Nikola Kopernik
Nikola Kopernik d amussnayyur, aẓar-is d apuluni. Ittwassen s teẓri I d-iqqaren : iṭij d areggag (ur ittmimiḍ ara) di tlemmast n umeɣrad (univers). Amaḍal itezzi ɣef yiman-is abrid i wass, deg usseggwas ɣef iṭij (système hélicocentrique).
Kupernik ilul ass n 19 di furar 1473 di temdint n Torun di tmurt n Pulunya, gar twacult n imzenza d yinawuren (fonctionnaires). Xal-is Lukas Watzelrude imended ɣef tɣuri ines. Deg usseggwas n 1491, Kupernik ikcem ɣer tesdawit n Krakubi, syin akk
... (198 chars skipped) ... 
sdawit n Bologne, din i yezdi taxxamt d usalmad amussnak Dominico Maria Novara (1454-1504). Kupernik, ilha-d s trakalt (géographie) d tussnayyurt (astronomie).
Deg usseggwas 1500, ifka isaragen ɣef tussnayyurt di Rome. Deg usseggwas 1503, Kupernik ikfa Duktura-ines n uzref, di Ferrare.
Seg usseggwas 1503 ar usseggwas 1510, Kupernik illa ɣer xal-is di Plogne. Gar usseggwas 1507 d usseggwas 1515, ikfa adlis ɣef tussnayyurt De Hypothesibus Motuum Coelestium a se Commentariolus. Deg usseggwas 1512, 
... (198 chars skipped) ...
530.
Zzat tegrawla takupernikit, imussnawen la d-qqaren: amaḍal ur ittmimiḍ ara. Tiknurin (planètes) illan tezzint I umaḍal.
Anagraw akuperniki (système de Copernic) ibedd ɣef: - Yiwet : amaḍal itezzi deg yiwen wass ɣef yiman-is, deg usseggwas ɣef iṭij. - Tis-snat, tiknurin nniḍden zgant tezzint ɣef iṭij.
S waya, Kupernik isebrurez-ed amek illa wass d yiḍ. Maca, ayen i d-inna, di lqern XVI, d kra kan imussnawen I t)irefden; I t-yumnen; tugett ugin ayen I d-yenna; ayen id- yufa.

Tawrat
Tawrat (neɣ Turat, s taɛebrit תּוֹרָה 'tteɛlim') d adlis n ddin n Tudayt, am Leqran d adlis n ddin n Islam. Ɣur Udayen nttat d awal n Ṛebbi i yefka Musa i Ayt Israyil.
Dg-es llan xemsa n wedlisen:
- בראשית 'Bereycit' = 'di tazwara'
- שמות Cemot = 'isma'
- ויקרא Wayiqra = 'd yetiɣri'
- במדבר Bammidbar = 'di yeqqar'
- דברים Debarim = 'awal'
Deg Bereycit yella amezruy n ddunit d n leqbilt n Wudayen ('ayt yisrayil'). Deg Cemot ddejen ayt yisrayel Maṣer d ruḥn s Israyil. Deg wayiqra yenna-yas Ṛebbi i Moce ger Lewiyim.
Tawrat d deg wedlis wabaraw, Tanax, d wedlis n Nebiyim d d wedlis n Ketubim.

Fell-as i tura Camille LACǦSTE-DUJARDIN : « … d yiwen si Leqbayel yebḍan ɣef sin idelsan : idles n teqbaylit d win n trumit ». Meɛna nekk a-d-iniɣ : Belɛid, ul-is ɣer teqb
... (9207 chars skipped) ...

Illa di Merruk, yuɣ tarumit, isɛa taḥanut. « Ulac anda nniḍen, ɣer Muḥend Saɛid kan ar a-rreɣ ». ẓas akken ur t-issin ara, meɛna « gma-k d gma-k, ɣas d mmi-s n yemma-k ». Ahat a s-d-yaf amkan, i mi leqraya iɣra. Iṭṭef-itt d abrid ar Bgayet ɣef uḍar. Dinna insa kra n wuḍan di leqhawi.

Aṛekka
Aṛekka neɣ Aṛak (Assaɣ ussnan: Vulpes rueppellii) d yiwet n telmest n iburaɣ yeṭṭafaren tawacult n taydiyyin, yettidir deg Tefrikt n ugafa d usamar alemmas, Talmest-a tettidir gar n 6 ar 7 n iseggasen

"Tirzi-a d tagnit n ufareṣ i Mass Ajiniral Ameqqran i wakken ad iwali amek i d-yeḍra uselkem n yikaten n uḥezzeb mgal n unfafad Buqacuc Covid-19, aswaḍ n kra n teyunin akked uselwi n yiwet n temlilit n uwelleh i unzaḍ akked yikataren n Temnaḍt", i d-yesseddi uɣbalu-nni.
Ajiniral ameqqran Chanegriha ad yegg tirzi n umahil ass n usinas ɣer Temnaḍt taredsant tis 2 deg Wehran
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Ajinira ameqqran, Saïd Chanegriha, Aɣella n leɛḍil n yifesyanen n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfan (ANP), ad yegg azekka n usinas (ttlata), yiwet n tirzi n umahil akked uswaḍ ɣer Temnaḍt taredsant tis 2 deg Wehran, i d-yenna ass n uynas (letniyen) yiwen n ulɣu n uɣlif n Temḥaddit taɣelnawt (MDN).

Pitch Black
Pitch Black (anamk-ines s Tmaziɣt: Tallest tuẓẓift) d yiwen usaru (afilm) Amerikan n tsugint tussnant itwagg di useggwas n 2000, i -t David Twohy, yirar deg-s usegbar Amerikan Vin Diesel. Asaru-yagi itwagg s $23 imelyan, issidf-d $53 imelyan.
Asaru-a iggur ɣef yiwen ubekkaḍ i wumi qqaren-as Richard B. Riddick (Vin Diesel) itwaksi deg yiwet teɣbarrut (ababor) n tallunt ɣer tkurmut deg yiwen ublanit. Awaren i armi tuwḍa teɣrrabut n tallunt-nni g yiwen ublanit yuzɣen, Riddick irwel si tɣrrabut. Maca aql-it dinna kan iɣersiwen ttffɣn-d akid-sen xminni teɣli tfukt. Marra medden-nni i ttugha yellan di teɣrrabut fell-asen ad rwlen si ublanit-nni s yiwen usafag, maca manaynni iqseḥ aṭas. Awaren i usaru n Pitch Black iffeɣ-d yiwen usaru nniḍen di 2004, yirar deg-s Vin Diesel, qqaren-as The Chronicles of Riddick.

Arram amesguceṛ unɣid
Arram amesguceṛ unɣid (Azamul-is: RCT id yekkan seg EN: Randomised Controlled Trial) d talmest gar n inawen n unagi ussnan anarum aladɣa deg tɣult n tesnujjya. Anda imdanen ɣef wacu id tettili tezrawt ttwasennefrun s ugucar (s imisi neɣ apipri) s yiwet neɣ ugar n tarrayin n ussuji yemgaraden yettilin deg tezrawt. Dɣa irramen imesgucaṛen unɣiden ttumeggzen d akayad n umnir deg warramen ilektuyen yerna yettwasemres (yettwaseqdec) i wkayad n tmellilt n inawen yemgaraden n inekcumen isnajjyanen. Akken id yezmer ad yefk isalan ɣef tasedmirt tansafart tuɣnift.
Irmawen "RTC" d Tirmit tagacuṛant ttwasemrasent deg kra n tikwal am igdawalen, maca tallilt tamalxayt tanarrayt tga d taggaẓt n RTC s isem kan i warramen ilan (yesɛan) tigrawin n usemyif

Imuzzar n Uẓuḍ
Llan Imuzzar n Uẓuḍ ɣ tmnaḍt n Azilal ɣ tsga n Bni Mllal-Xnifra gr Uzilal d Dmnat. Gan yan ɣ idɣarn fulkinin ɣ tmazirt n Lmɣrib. Twassann s tḍuṛiwin nns attuynin. Ar d ṭṭaṛn waman n imuzzar ad zɣ tiddi n 150 (tmiḍi d sin ignarn d mraw) n id mitru .
Ɣ unbdu, ar sis ttddun middn ad gis zuzwun, fjjijn ɣ tagant nns ifulkin. Tagant ad, tlla gis tugt n ibuɣas nɣ iẓɛḍaḍ itturarn iggi n waddagn. Maca, tawnnaḍt (ku mad aɣ issutln zun d aman d wakal d waddagn d imudar), ur gis tzddig zun d zik, acku ar gis ggarn (ar gis tluḥn) kra ɣ inrzaf arras ɣ waman, d ar ṛẓẓan addagn. Ɣmkann af d tmẓẓi tagant, idrusn gis ibuɣas acku ur a sul ttafan mad cttan. Munn imzdaɣn n uẓuḍ ɣ yat tmsmunt afad ad afn afssay i tmukrisin ad ixcnn.[1]

Ibn Xaldun (ism nns iɣzifn s taɛṛabt : أبو زيد عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن خلدون الحضرمي; Abu Zayd Ɛabdrahman ibn Muhammd ibn Xaldun al-Hadrami ) iga yan bumzruy d argaz n tusna n tmtti, d afiluzuf. Iga amkras n mnnaw n yiẓliyn: Tamzrugrafit, d tasnmttit, d tadamsa, d tadimuɣrafit. Izuyd ɣ Tuns ass n 27 mayu n usggʷas 1332 ɣ yat tawja tandalusit imqqurn labas darsn illan ɣ tmazirt n Lyaman, immut ass n 17 mars n useggʷas 1406 ɣ Lqahiṛa ɣ Miṣṛa.
Adlis nns lli bahra ittussan iga t Almuqaddima (Tazwurt), yura t ɣ ṣḍiṣ iyyurn. Imrsi nns iga t amzruy asnmtti-ajuɣrafi-adamsan n umaḍal.

Ageffur aneggaru d udfel i d-yeɣlin s ṭṭaqa deg waɣir n Bgayet, glan-d s waṭas n txessar d wuguren i yimezdaɣ. Ɣef wakken i d-yewwi Uḥuddu aɣarim (Protection civile) n Bgayet, deg wulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, ugar n semmus n yiberdan i imedlen deg sin n wussan-nni ideg yettwaɣ lḥal maḍi. Amedya n udrar n Yicellaḍen, ideg teḥbes tikli deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis 26A. Snat n tnilliwin n Leqser ttwamedlent daɣen ɣef ssebba n ufiḍi n Wasif Asemmam (Sumam), armi d abrid aɣelnaw wis 75 i d-imugren d asellak wid iḥeslen. Ijerred daɣen Uḥuddu aɣarim aṭas n tuffɣiwin i ferru n yiɣilifen d usellek n medden. Gar-asent, ad d-nebder, tuffɣa ɣer Melbu, ɣer Termist ICOTAL n Bgayet d Saket, mbeɛd aggelgel n waman. Yettwajerred daɣen usellek n temrawt n tfunasin i iḥeslen deg wasif, tamnaḍt n Rmila, akked tukksa n yiwet n ṭṭejra d tameqqrant, i d-yeɣlin ɣef uɣlad deg Leqser. Ad d-nesmekti d akken llant-d ula d kra n usyax n wakal, abeɛda deg Leflay, Tiban, d Bulimat.
M. K.

Iḍarren iberkanen
Isem n "yiḍarren iberkanen" yemmal-d, irumyen id-wwi Fransa ɣer tmura n Tefriqt n ugafa si Turuft Kamel mi tent-tekcem ur ffiɣen seg-sent armi d-wwint timunnent-nsent deg meɣres 1956 seg Tunes d Lmerruk, neɣ di yulyu 1962 seg tmurt n Lezzayer, ciṭ deg-sen ugin ad fɣen maca amur ameqqran uɣalen ɣer Fransa .

 d-yeffɣen deg wass n 26 yunyu 1889, i yefkan talɣent i akk iberraniyen i ylulen deg Lezzayer, d ayen id-yefkan 150,000 n yifransisen deg Lezzayer di ddaw n 30 n yiseggasen kan, amḍan n talɣenin nniḍen isubb aṭas akka am tin n Sbenyul tsubb-d seg 54 % ar 36 % gar yiseggasen n 1876 d 1901.
Armi d taggara n tasut tis xix i faqen belli uɣalen yirumyen mxalaḍen akk akka, ladɣa imi amḍan n wid i ylulen deg Lezzayer yugar i ubrid amezzwaru win n id-yunagen ɣur-s. Di tallit-a ggan yimdanen agi id-yekka

en ar 150 000 n yirumyen deg wakal azzayri, yiwen n uneɣmmas iɛawed leḥsab n yirumùyen i yellan di Lezzayer di 1979 yufa-ten-id gar 3 000 d 4 000 di Lezzayer s lekmal,yiwet n tremnadit tenna-d berlli uwḍen armi d 30 000 n yirumyen deg 199; deg yiseggasen n 90 yerna isubb-d umḍan agi imi yella rebrab, id-yerran ula d irumyen deg yiswi-ines ɣef wannecta aṭas yid-sen ugaden ɣef tudert-nsen ǧǧan tamurt n Lezzayer, deg 2008 yettuɛawed leḥsab nnan-d belli llan gar 800 d 4 500 n yifransisen di Lezzayer

Game of Thrones
Game of Thrones (Game of Thrones) sulfentid imarikanien aseggas n 2011 sɣur George RR Martin. Ihekkud taqsit n-el familyat ivɣan ad hekmen Westeros, gar Ath Stark, Lannister, Baratheon. Jon Snow ig kechmen ar "La garde de nuit" (Night's watch). Akud Daenerys Targaryen di Essos, tesaa 3 les dragons. yellis nu selway n Westeros itwanɣan. nettat tevɣa atughal tageldunt.
Taqsit aggi tesaa attas "les personnages", garasen:
Ath Stark: Ticin di Winterfell
Eddard , tamttutist Catelyn, arrawnsen : Robb, Sansa, Arya, Bran, Rikon. Akud Jon Snow.
Ath Lannister : Tiicin di Casterly Rock
Tywin akud warrawiss : Cersei, Jaime, Tyrion. Cercei akud Jaime saan arraw nsen stufra; Joffrey, Myrcella akud Tommen
Ath Targaryen: ala Daenerys id mazal
Daenerys akud gmas Viserys, vavtsen d Aerys II, saan gmatsen amuqran yemmut; Rhaegar. yella daɣen Mestre Aemon di taasast n yid (La garde de nuit).
Ath Baratheon:
Renly akud sin wetmaten imuqranen; Robert, Stannis yesaa yellis Shireen.
Ath Tyrell : di High Garden
Olenna, miss d Mace, arraw n miss d Margaery akud Loras.
Ath Greyjoy: The iron islands
Balon greyjoy. Arrawiss d Theon akud Yara. yessaa gmas amectuh; Euron.
Ath Mormont:
Jorah akud vavas Geor. thella yiwet taqcic tamzyant ismiss Lyanna.
Wiyadh:
Melissandre, Sandor Clgane, Missandei, Khal Drogo, Mestre Pycelle, Mestre Luwin, Sam Tarly, Brienne n Tarth.

Albanya
Tamazirt n Walbanya ism nns amaddud Tagdudant n Walbanya niɣ d Republika e Shqipërise s talbanyit. Tamaẓunt nns d tɣrmt nns akkʷ mqqurn tga tt Tirana d tutlayt nns tunṣibt tga tt Cqiprya, ism nns illa dars unamk n "Tmazirt n igidrn".
Albanya tga yat ɣ tmizar da llanin ɣ usammr ayffus n Urupa ɣ yat tsga mi ttinin Iblqann, tuggt n imzdaɣn nns ddrn ɣar f tfllaḥt.
400 n usggʷas ad tkka tga yan ugzzum ssɣ tmnukda Taɛtmanit, ur tumẓ tidrfit nns ar 1912, ssɣ 1944 ar tizwiri n tmrawt tis tẓat rad tg yat tmazirt tanjmawt.

Awal yuzzel di yal tmurt, tadyant tuYal d tameqqrant. Tadyant n anemhal n zik n FMI, Dominique Strauss-Kahn i t-yerzan Yer Nafissatou Diallo, i yeccetkan fell-as imi, akken i
d-tenna, yebYa ad tt-yeqqu mebla ma tebYa!
Zrin 3 wagguren segmi teṭṭef tamsalt-a taYdemt n Marikan, DSK yeffeY-d si twaYit ideg yella. Γas akka, yessefrek
iman-is si lḥebs, tuget n tlufa i s-iruḥen imi iwakken ad d-yerr tugna-nni-ines n zik, ilaq-as aṭas n wakudn usgunfu. Rnu Yer wanect-a yesruḥ amḍiq-is deg FMI akken daYen ur itekki ara di tefrant
n tselwayt n Fransa di 2012. Akken neẓra, imeYnasen n tama tazelmeḍt n Fransa, bnan akk asirem-nsen Yef DSK iwakken ad yili d aselway-nsen amer ur d-teḍri ara tedyant-a i t-icemmten. Tura akken
yebɣu yili win ara yilin d agensas n tizulmeḍt n Fransa, ama d Martine Aubry neɣ d François Hollande, ur yelli d asirem meqqren sdat n DSK ilan tarmit ama di tsertit neɣ di tdamsa.
Anẓarfu n New York, Michael Obus yessuref-as ayen iYef nwan ad t-ḍefren. Nafissatou Diallo, taxeddamt n taxxamt
deg usensu n Sofitel, tger taluft Yer teYdemt Yef DSK ass n 14 mayu yezrin, ur tessaweḍ ara ad tqenneɛ taYdemt n Marikan. Aṭas ikiddicen i as-d-kksen!
Wid yellan deg ukabar-is asertan ferḥen imi d ayen tefra tfuk taluft-a yessamsen udem n tama tazelmaḍt n tsertit
n Fransa.

Xas ulamma ẓran yimdanen lemḍarat swayes i d-igellu uculliḍ n uplastik, ama ɣef twennadt ama ɣef tezmart n umdan, ladɣa bu tiɣmi taberkant , maca ad t-naf yettwaḍeggar di yal amkan. Aya,i icemmet tugna n twennadt di tmurt. Yesluɣuy uma d aman. D tawaɣit i yiselman d wayen akk yettidiren daxel n waman-a.  d tazmert n umdan, tettili deg umuhi (danger). Amedya, mi ara tuɣal tgella yeḥman deg uculliḍ-a. Akken nezra, allalen-nni s wayes yettwaxdem uculliḍ-nni, ur nelhi ara. Ihi, ad d-glun s lemḍarrat ɣef tgella-nni. Syin, ad tt-yečč umdan mebla ma ifaq s wanect-a. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i d-ttwaxlaqen aṭas n tddukkliwin deg taggara-a di tmurt. Ad nebdar tiddukkla n Gourara n taddart n Triḥant di tɣiwant n Bujimeɛ. Tiddukkla-a, tefka azal ameqqran i usentel-a: texdem yiwen n wahil i tebda deg useggas n 2

a, ssawḍen akken ad jemɛen azal n ṭun n uplastik, i yettwaɛawden asexdem. Akken daɣen i xedmen imekwan i iḍuman di taddart, akken imezdaɣ ur ttdeggiren ara iḍuman-nsen deg twennadt. Zyada ɣef waya, thegga-d tddukkla-a, s lemɛawna n yiwet n termist, di tɣiwant n Tigzirt, ajmaɛ n uplastik. Gar yiswiyen n tddukkla n twennadt Gourara d asuzer txeddem akken at zuzerakke useɛlem n yimdanen s lemḍarrat i d-igellu uplastik, ama ɣef twennadt , neɣ ɣef tezmart n umdan , aɣersiw akked imɣan.

Karim Benzema
Karim Benzema (ilul deg 19 dujamber 1987 deg Lyon, Fransa), d amarir n ddabex uḍar afrensis, laṣel-nnes d azzayri seg At Jlil.
Ass-a, Benzema yetturar d amenṭag (attaquant) deg Real Madrid yerna yetturar deg teɣlamt taɣelnawt tafrensist. Benzema yeffeɣ-d seg tkadimit n yilemẓiyen n Lyon. Deg 2008, yettekka deg telɣuɣa (championnat) n UEFA Euro 2008. Deg tsemhuyt (saison) n 2007-2008, d netta ay d amarir afrensis ay yeskecmen aṭas n yeswan (buts), yerna d aya ay t-yejjan ad d-yerbeḥ aṭas n warrazen. Deg Yulyu n 2009, Benzema yestenya leɛqed n 6 n yiseggasen akked Real Madrid yerna ass-a yeqqel d netta ay d amarir n tkurt n uḍar ay yettuxellaṣen aṭas akk deg Fransa.
En octobre 2021, dans le procès de Karim Benzema dans l’affaire de la sextape de Mathieu Valbuena, le parquet de Versailles a demandé au tribunal correctionnel de prononcer une peine de dix mois d’emprisonnement avec sursis et 75.000 euros d’amende contre Karim Benzema.

Le Rifain
Awarn i ubeddi n xemsa n iyuren zeg usewwer n tseddit « Meɣriḍu ». Asbeddi-ya i dd-yusin d isuraf n uḥadur zeg ubirus n Covid-19. Tedwel terfiqt n tseddit-a ḥuma ad tkemmel asewwer-nnes.
Meɣridu, i ttuɣa nettraja bac a dd-ɛdunt tlatin n texrazin-nnes di remḍan i yeɛdun. Maca lebbla-ya n kuruna i dd-yehwan x lɣeflet, tessefrinar-it. Manaya i yejjin atlibizyun n tmaziɣt a dd-yesseɛdu taseddit n « nigru » i twalat nniḍen deg wemkan n meɣriḍu.
Meɣriḍu, i ittsewwren di Ddriwec. D ijjen tenfust n tlata n iḥudriyen, ad wḍan di lfexx n yijjen mafya n tmura d lebni d usenɛerq aḥessi. Zegga i nejmen, jjullen ad xelfen zi mafya-nni, s usexdem n tebridin n ttiknulujit tatrart.
Yenna Muḥemmed Buzeggu deg yijjen tzemmemt-nnes di Facebook: « Awarn i ubiddi… Tedwel-dd tẓuri… Meɣriḍu.. »
Yerni Buzeggu yenna: « Ssitimeɣ zi tmeddukal-inu d imeddukal-inu, ijjen s yijjen. Titiqniyin d itiqniyen, tinaẓurin d inaẓuren isuraf iqaden di lxedmet i tteggen. Tteggen merra tizemmar-nsen ḥuma a dd-ssufɣen lxedmet-a i ibedden ca n xemsa n iyuren.. Ɣer zzat, ttqadiɣ-kenniw s wul-inu.. »
Asinaryu n tseddit-a yura-t Muḥemmed Buzeggu. Yessufuɣ-it-idd Ṭariq Lidrisi. ttiraren deg-s yetran n utlibizyun n sini di Arif. Zeg-sen Benɛisa Lmestiri d Ɛebdellah Anas d Racid Ameɛṭuk d Mimun Zanun, d Ṭariq Ccami, d Samira Lmesluḥi, d Silya Ziyani, d Meryem Ssalmi, d Cayma Ɛellawi, d Btisam Ɛebbasi, d Muḥemmed Selṭana d Ṭṭeyyeb Lmeɛɛac d Rafiq Berjal d yinneɣni…

Amagrad : Izen n Baden Bawel i ufesnaw
Asmil : Tigejda n tanaramant
Amyaru:Amaruyidir
“Ad wen-sutraɣ kunwi a iɣella n temzayin(Ifesnawen), ad sileɣeɣ deg umtedu timzayin-nwen i merra d ussafen, tzemrem ad teṭfem deg ufus yal yiwen seg inaramen ad teqlem d arrac imhulen. Ur yeli iwumi ad tesɛum yiwen neɣ sin ifazen, wiyaḍ d arrac ur nesɛi azal. Ilaq ad arzem aken ad ilin akk di tqacuct. Axater deg aya d amedya ad walin ɣur-wen, ayen ara tgem ifaddaden-nwen ad gen“.
“Sken-asen bli tesneḍ ad tsegḍeḍ i tenbaḍin, tid yuran d tid ad tesleḍ s umzuɣ-ik, yerna ad ten-t-selkmeḍ di tibawt n uɣela iked tibat-is.
Mel-asen bli tḥellaḍ-d timadaytin n tezmert, yerna mebla aṭas n tgasirt n tesraqqayt, ad ten-d awim ma yela arrac-inek ḍafaren indahen-ik.
Mekti-d bli ilaq ad teṭfeḍ aqaru n umusu, mačči ad degireḍ-t s deffir”.

Lferz-a di lwert, wer yeqqim ca aṭṭas am mamek ttuɣa qbel, maca ɛad yella. Ɣer ineggura-ya, din ilaɣiten n yewdan i itterran taynit i tseqqar n yewdan, bac ad yili wemquddi di lwert jer iwetman d twetmin. Maca ilaɣiten-a ttafen ayt uxarres n tmeslemt ttbeddan-asen di tmijja, tteggen-asen tisuḍar n yeḍrisen n ddin deg webrid, bac isurifen am yina wer ttmernin ɣer zzat.

Beleid n At Aeli (Izarar Belaid)
D amyarru s teqbaylit ger imezwura.
Tameddurt-is[beddel | edit source]
Illul deg usegwas n 1909 deg tama n Tubiret deg yiwet n taddart anda yemma-s tella tesYaray.
Asmi yella d amectuḥ, yemma-s, taselmadt teselmeda-s tameslayt tarumit. Teslemda-s daYen taqbaylit yettemeslay akw twaccult-is.
Deg usegwas n 1915, Beleid n At Aeli yesɛa 6 n isegwasen di laemer-is, irruḥ ar taddart n Uẓru Uqellal deg Ǧerǧer anda yekccem ar uYerbaz. Imi yesen aṭas tarumit, yufrared ger warrac niḍen.

Kaius Sallustius Krispus
Amek i d iban Yugurten di libri n Sallustius d wamek i t-ttwalin Iṛumaniyen d Inumidiyen.

Ihi, Yugurten, akken ttidiren at tmurt-is i yitidir ula d neţţa: am nutni, iteddu f ugmer, ikkat afilum, iţmɛebbar d tizyiwin-is. Maca, ulac w’i s-izemren : yugar-iten akken ma llan. Ulac win ur t-nessin. Isem-is, mechur. X
... (5742 chars skipped) ... 
ɣur-es iseɣ ar Irumaniyen. Deg wakken ixlaɛ akk s wannect-agi, ibeddel ṛṛay. Inna-yas d ayen ilhan kan ara ţ-ifrun. "Yugurten-agi, ilaq a s-geɣ azal." Dɣa imir imir iga-t d mmi-s (yadupti-t). Yerra-t d aweṛṛit-is. Yerna-t-id ar warraw-nni-ines: Aderbal d Umfṣal. Rnan kra iseggasen akken, teɣli-d tewser d waṭan ar Makawsn. Ifhem, d akken atan ɣef tizi n tmeddit. Iga akka, igerw-d imeddukkal-is, at wexxam-is, gar-asen Aderbal akked Umfṣal, isawel i Yugerten, inna-yas zdat-sen awal-agi: X. « Seg wa
... (5742 chars skipped) ...
nt n ufus. XVI. Tagara, di Ssina, d widak-nni i yeččan tajjɛelt i yessaɛddan awal-nnsen. Degmi ittgezmen Iṛumaniyen akkagi, nnan-as tamurt-agi n Numidiya issefk ad tebdu ɣef ssin. Yiwen umur a t-yawi Yugurten, wayeḍ a t-yawi Uderbal. Dùa, uznen 10 yergazen ɣer Numidiya, akken ad frun tamsalt, ad ferqen tamurt-agi n Numidya ger Yugurten d Uderbal. Akken kan i wwḍen ibbasaduṛen-agi ar Numidiya, iruḥ-d Yugurten ɣur-sen, inced-iten ar wexxam-is, ifka-yasen isuṛdiyen. Yuɣ-iten. Yerra-ten d imeddukal.

Areqqeɛ n uẓekka n Kaysa i lmend n 40 n wussan
Akken yella deg wansayen n yimezwura-nneɣ seg waṭas-aya, i lmend n uɛeddi n 40 n wussan seg tmettant n tmarut Kaysa Xalifi, i d-yeḍran ass n 25 yunyu 2018, thegga-d twacult n tmerḥumt-a, akked kra seg wid i tt-iqerben, kra n yiqeddicen i d-yeṭṭafaren ass-nni, i yemmugen merra ɣef rruḥ n Kaysa. Am wakken zwarent tigawin-nniḍen teɣzi n 40 n wussan seld tamettant-is. Dɣa, tazwara d aẓekka i as-yettwabnan i tnezduɣt-is n lebda, tanezzayt n wass-nni n sed 4 ɣuct. Nezmer ad nɣer deg uẓekka-a s teqbaylit d tfinaɣ : « Da i testeɛfa tmarut Kaysa Xalifi. Tlul ass n 14 yunyu 1991. Temmut ass n 25 yunyu 2018. Nekni n Rebbi, ad ɣur-s nuɣal ». Syin, kra n teswiɛt, zdin yimezdaɣ n taddart unuden n tgella i d-yettwaheggan beddemma n waya, ama i tlawin deg uxxam, neɣ i yirgazen di berra. Yal yiwen yesɛa-d dɣa tidmi s tɣara-is ɣef tmarut tilemẓit Kaysa Xalifi, i yettwaḥemmlen aṭas, armi, amecwar n wakud d amecṭuḥ, tella-d tirza i uẓekka-ines s waṭas n leḥzen d yiḥulfan. Deg wadeg, sersen wid ibedden i uqerruy n Kaysa snat n tmuqqinin n yijeǧǧigen, deg tegnit n umeslay akked yiman. Yewwi-d ad d-nernu talɣut belli deg yiẓekwan akk yellan di tjebbant-nni n Tizi Lwali, d win n Kaysa i d amezwaru i yettwarun s tutlayt taqbaylit, segmi yebda umezruy ahat. Yesmektay-d waya ugur adelsan n tmetti taqbaylit n wass-a. Sgunfu di talwit a Kaysa!
M. K.

Ar tura ur yettwafares ara wayen tesɛa tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel i uselḥu n uḥric n tmerrit deg-s. Ama d ayen yellan d tigemmi tagamant, tamezrayt neɣ tadelsant.
Ur d-yelli deg yakk deg-sent usefti akken ad d-tbeyyen iman-is tɣiwant-a n usamar n Bgayet deg taɣult-a. Ussan iɛeddan, yella-d umeslay ɣef usnulfu n rreḥba n umerreḥ deg walbaɛḍ n yimeḍqan n teẓgi n Udrar n Takkuct, i yellan d amezwaru di teɛlayt deg waɣir n Bgayet. umerreḥ ula i warrac imecṭaḥ. Dɣa, deg ubrid n ugerrez n tegnatin i tmerrit deg Ayt Smaɛel, ula d imḍebbren n tɣiwant, sɛan asenfar deg waya taggara-a. Amedya n ugerrez n yiberdan i yettawin s adrar tazwara, gar-asen win ara yessawaḍen ɣer Takkuct. Daɣen, ula ɣer Udrar n Fad, yezmer sya ɣer sdat, ad yettwaldi ubrid n tkerrust seg Yiɣil Wulli alamma d Afalu n Telɣemt. Adeg-a dɣa, d yiwen seg wid i d-igan tisewham i yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel ɣef wamek yemmug deg tecwawt n Udrar n Fad anda i d-yezga. T
... (161 chars skipped) ...
gan deg Uɣdir, i izemren ad d-yejbed ayendin d imerrayen, ulac ad d-ilin kra n yiqeddicen i uwenneɛ abeɛda n ubrid aweɛran i n-yettawin. Ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, ula d kra n yimezdaɣ, zgan-d mgal aya, ur bɣin win ara iḥazen ciṭṭuḥ si tferkiwin-nsen. Ugar n wayen i d-nebder, yezmer daɣen ad yili ulzuz (ssuq) n wallalen n tgemmi d yisafaren idiganen, d tagnit yelhan i uqenneɛ n umerray. Tiddukla n « Iqra » tettekka deg usselmed n 1,6 amelyun n Yizzayriyen
WEHṚAN – Tiddukla n « Iqra » tettekka deg usselmed n tira ed tɣuri n 1,6 amelyun n Yizzayriyen deg tikli-nnes taɣelnawt n meḥḥu n lqella n tmussni, ɣef wakken ay aɣ-d-tenna tselwayt n tiddukla-a ass n ssebt deg Wehṛan.
Amḍan n yinelmaden imawaḍen ay yessaggzen deg temsirin n welmad n tira ed tɣuri ɣer tiddukla n « Iqra » yuweḍ, imir-a, ɣer 130.000 deg wakk timiwa n tmurt, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna Aicha Barki deg yiwet n temlilit 
... (380 chars skipped) ... 
t n tezrawt ay tga tiddukla deg 2012, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna temḍebbert-a.
Tiddukla-a telha-d daɣ s uqeyyem n tsuddest taɣelnawt n meḥḥu n lqella n tmussni 2007-2015 s wemɛiwen ed weɣlif n tteṛbeyya taɣelnawt, ɣef leḥsab n Massa Barki, ay d-yennan dakken Ldzayer tesseqdec akk ttawilat ay yessefken i usselmed n tira ed tɣuri.
Tiddukla tadzayrit « Iqra » la tessaram ad tesɛu aẓayer (statut) n tanfa tazayezt, d win ay tessuter sɣur yiduba izuyaz s weḍfar n lqanun ay yesseddayen tiddukliwin, ɣef wakk
... (380 chars skipped) ...
d ayen ara yefken ljehd i wahil n usselmed n tira ed tɣuri deg twilayt-a, d ahil ay la yekkaten akken d yesḥulfu (sensibiliser) medden akken ad faṛsen seg temsirin-a n welmad.
Seg tama niḍen, lbiru n twilayt n tiddukla n « Iqra » yessuddes-d, deg temlilit-a aydeg ttekkan waggagen (intellectuels) ed yigensase (représentants) n tiddukliwin, aṭas n yermuden (activités) gar-asen yiwen n usarag (conférence) aydeg a d-sfehmen i tlawin kra n leqwanin yettḥuddun mgal tekriḍt (violence) akken tebɣu tili.

Tagrawt-a tacinwat ttekkant deg-s 2 n teṛmisin yernu ti d Guangzhou Shipyard International (GSI) d China Shipbuilding Trading Company (CSTC).
Agatu-a ad d-yesqam 175 n yimelyunen n yidulaṛen yernu iwemmeṛ-it uselway-anemhal amatu n Teṛmist Taɣelnawt n Umesni Awlal n Yemsiklen, Ahcene Grairia, iselwayen n GSI d CSTC, s weḥdaṛ n uneɣlaf n yimahilen inagduden d umesni, Abdelghani Zaalane d tgensast n tmahelt n Ccinwa deg Ldzayer, He Hongyan.
Aɣerrabu-a ad yettwabnu deg 26 n wayyuren, ad yesɛu 199,9 deg teɣzef d 29,95 n yimitren deg tehri yernu ad taweḍ tazzalt-nnes ɣer 24 n tkerwas (43,68 n yikilumitren n wesrag).
Ad yesɛu snat n tneččiyin, tamesrit n watay, inurar n wurar i yigerdan, tallunt n tẓallit d tzeɣɣa n waddal.

Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 30 deg waggur-agi n cutember ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit deg Uzday adelsan Rahmani Slimane n Aokas deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D timlilit ideg i d-yemmeslay umaru d uselmad deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu akked Usudu (institut) aɣelnaw n tutlayin d tɣermiwin n usamar “INALCO” n Paris deg tmurt n Fransa, wagi Mass Saïd Chemakh i d-yewwin awal ɣef usentel-agi “ Tasekla tamaziɣt yettwarun, (amedya n tsekla taqbaylit). Imeslay-d s telqay ɣef wayen yellan d aqdim deg-s d wayen i d-yenulfan deg yiseggasen-agi yezrin. Am wakken daɣen i d-yebder aṭas n yiwudam n tsekla taqbaylit, yebda-tt-id seg yimezwura alarmi d wid n yiseggasen-agi ineggura. Am wakken daɣen i d-imeslay ɣef tewsatin n tsekla tamaziɣt ladɣa taqbaylit d wanida yewweḍ leqdic deg-sen, d wayen akk i d-yellan d amaynut deg tewsatin-is yemgaraden.
A. A

Deg uḍris iɛeddan, anda i d-newwi ɣef tnagit n Bulus, nessaken-d udem d umezruy n wergaz-agi, i yellan d amyaru meqqren, d iminig ger leǧnas, yeǧǧa-d aṭas n tiktiwin d uselmed n teflest tamasiḥit, yerna s tira-ines daɣen i yettunefk lsas n « Tira » n Lɛehd Ajdid. Degmi, deg uṭun-agi wis 5 ɣef titeggarin n Lɛhed Ajdid, a d-nawi ɣef Tira i d-yeǧǧa umceggeɛ Bulus. D ttbut iṣeḥḥan i s ibeddent « Tira » n Lɛehd Ajdid.
Di tebṛatin n Bulus ara naf aṭas n uselmed yeɛnan liman amisiḥi. Deg-sent tikta d w

"Tukkist deg Uɣmis "Tiɣremt"

« Aktamur n tulut d umnig mliḥ i tmura n Tuddsa n Tmura Timsiǧiwin n Upitṛul d tid tt-yexḍan deg wayyur n Yennayer », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Arkab deg yijifeṛ n temlilit tis 27 n tesmilt taɣlifant n uḍfar n umtawa n tegrawt-a ay d-yebdan ass n ukras s usarag n teẓrit.
Mass Arkab yenna-d dakken amlu n uktazel n tesmilt tatwilant tucrikt twekked-d dakken tuna ay d-yettwasebḍen deg ukatar n umtawa-nni ttwazerkent deg wayyur n Yennayer n 2021.
Anmeqqen-a sɣur yimaslaḍen n Tuddsa n Tmura Timsiǧwin n Upitṛul d Yimsisan-nnes, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uneɣlaf, yessaweḍ ɣer usali n watig n tbettit n upitṛul ay yekkan, ussan-a, 63 n yidulaṛen i upitṛul n Brent, am wakken ay d-yerna dakken tiḥemliwin n ufṣad, deg umaḍal, glant-d daɣ s tusurt ɣef wulzuz apitṛulan, dɣa d aya ay d-yesduqqsen, cwiṭ, asuter n upitṛul.
Seg yidis niḍen, ixebber-d uneɣlaf n teẓwert dakken timlilit-a ad tkemmel arma d ass n ukwas yernu ad tt-id-teḍfer temlilit taɣlifant tis 14 n Tuddsa n Tmura Timsiǧwin n Upitṛul d Yimsisan-nnes aydeg ara ttwaddmen yiɣtasen yerzan afares deg ukraḍyur ay d-yetteddun.

Alger Républicain
Alger Républicain d aɣmis ayallas ay d-sbedden Pascal Pia ed Paul Schmitt deg Ldzayer, deg 1938.
Tallalit[beddel]
Aɣmis-a n uzelmaḍ llan qeddcen deg-s aṭas n Yidzayriyen. Gar Tuber n 1939 ed Furar n 1943, yettwagdel (yettwamneɛ) weɣmis-a, sakkin, asmi ay d-yeqqel ɣer tuffɣa, yeqqel d aɣmis asduklan (communiste).
Deg wemgarru n Dzayer[beddel]
Deg Ctember n 1955, imi ay yebded ɣer yidis n Yidzayriyen ay yellan ttnaɣen ɣef uzarug (indépendance) n tmurt-nsen), aɣmis-a yettwagdel ti
... (87 chars skipped) ... 
eg), neɣ ttwenɣen, am Henri Maillot, Georges Rafini, Ɛemar Xaluf, Ɛabdelqader Benaɛmara, Murad At Saɛda ed Abdelkader Choukhal. Deg 17 Yulyu 1962 (sdeffir ma tuwey Ldzayer azarug-nnes), Alger Républicain yeqqel-d ɣer tuffɣa, yerna yeqqel d netta ay d aɣmis adzayri ay d-yessuffuɣen amḍan ameqran akk n tsukan (exemplaires) (75.000 yal ass).
Sakkin uzarug[beddel]
S waya, Alger Républicain yella yugar aɣmis n Le Peuple (n Terni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw). Deg 1964, imḍebbren n Alger Républicain qeblen ad r
... (87 chars skipped) ...
uttya-nni taserdasit aydeg Hewwari Bumedyen yesseɣli Ḥmed Ben Bella, anabaḍ adzayri yesdukkel iɣmisen n Alger Républicain ed Le Peuple yerna yerra-ten d yiwen n weɣmis umi isemma El Moudjahid. Sdeffir tedyanin n Tuber 1988, Alger Républicain yeqqel-d ɣer tuffɣa, maca ɣef ljal n wuguren ay d-yemlal, yeḥbes deg 1994. Seg yimir-nni, yeqqel itteffeɣ-d seg-a ɣer da, tikkal yal dduṛt, tikkal yal ayyur, ɣas akken mazal yesɛa uguren. Albert Camus ed Kateb Yasin seg wid ay d-yuran imagraden deg weɣmis-a.
