TAMURT – Ussan agi kan, yeffeɣ-d usali deg tiliẓriwin n umaḍal meṛṛa d akken Lamirat n Waɛraben Idduklen, gab-d laɛqud akken ad ddukel aka d afell-a. Iɛadda wazgen n lqern i Aɛraben n Falastin ttnaɣen d Israil ɣef akal i ten-icerken. Seg asmi i d lul tamurt n Israel, Aɛraben akken llan, ikker deg-sen ccwal imi uday yuɣal d amdan u isɛa tamurt.
Ayagi ugin ar ass-a at qeblen Waɛraben-inselmen. Ccwal yugi ad ifak ger wuday d waɛrab, yernu akken i d-qqaren imazrayen, uday d waɛrab d atmaten. Wissen 
... (1171 chars skipped) ... 
neɣ talehdjit i ttmeslayen. Maɛna akken qqaren at zik : « tayaziṭ tettarew, ayaziḍ i…. deffir-s ».
Nenna-d amezruy n Ccerq d win n icamiyen, anida aɛrab d wuday d atmaten, maca Ifalistiniyen d agdud n zik Filistin neɣ Afniq (phinicien). Yernu anida ten-isuɛd qqaren-d belli nutni cetla nsen seg Ifniqen. Ilubnanen neɣ Liban d Ifriniqen ula d nutni akked d Ipalistiniyen. Dagi bɣiɣ kan ad d-iniɣ, Aɛraben d atmaten n wudayen, d ttaggi i d sebba armi tura teddun ar tifrat waygarasen.
Maca ilaq ad twal
... (1171 chars skipped) ...
ur s-djan ara. Ulac ayen ur d-nnan ara fell-as d laɛyub, ula d baba-s erran-t immut d aḥerki.
Ilaq diɣen wemyaru Karim Akkouche, asmi irzef ula d netta ɣer tmurt agi n Israel, ur s-djan ara si regmat. Amek a ddin qessam !… aqbayli ur isɛuu ara azref ad imlil d wuday, d umarikani, atg, anagar aɛrab neɣ Afalastini ɣur-s azref ? Asfetri neɣ asečewčew d tanamit n win ur nezmir ara ad yeṭṭef iles-is. Abelheddaṛ d win iheddren aṭas mebla ameyyez d yiseɣ. Atah amek ara t-tɛeqlem. M ara yeqqim ar tama n wemdan ur yessin ara, ad yebdu ameslay ɣef tmeṭṭut-is, ssyen sakkin ad yeṭerḍeq ɣer arraw-is. Mi ifuk ameslay ɣef lwacul-is, a s-d-yeḥku i wemdan-nni abeṛṛani d acu i yečča d imensi iḍelli-nni tameddit, d acu i ixdem degmi yečča imensi, d acu i yurga imi yeṭṭes, ɣef acḥal i d-yekker ṣṣbeḥ-nni. Mi ifuk ameslay ɣef wayagi, ssye
... (1114 chars skipped) ... 
aḍi fell-as. Yekker-d yiwen lgil tura, ur ttamnen s wacemma. Ma tkemmel akkagi atan ad tenger ddunit. Akka, tura, d tilawin i yetteṛṛayen. Irgazen ččan akk timellalin n yesɣi. Ula deg wenejmuɛ, yenna-yas yiwen ass-nni i wayeḍ : « Wigi d lehduṛ n tsumta. » - Nniɣ-ak, kfan yizmawen n zik-nni. Zik-nni, necfa-d d argaz i yettsewwiqen, i yettḍebbiṛen, tura kra din ifuk, iḍelli wallaɣ yiwet n tmeṭṭut, a wi k-yeḥkan, wallaɣ-t teznuzuy ifelfel di ssuq. Nnan-ak tesɛa tibḥirin deg wasif. Yerna nnan-ak arg
... (1114 chars skipped) ...
kka. D wagi i d zzman i deg d-nugra. Wa yettanddi-tt i wa. Tikwal ttaggadeɣ a d-ffɣeɣ deg wexxam aqli nniɣ-ak. Ula d tameslayt tbeddel. Zik-nni imezwura-nneɣ ssnen ad meslayen. Tura lɣaci heddren kan, qlil n win iḥekmen deg yiles-is…
D wagi i d abelheddaṛ. Anda yella, ad tafeḍ iɛemmeṛ ssuq. Ur yettara ara akk iles-is ɣer daxel. Ad tt-yekkat di tẓebbujt ɣer tulmutt ḥacamma d ayen iqeṛḥ-ik uqerruy-ik. Wagi ad wen-iniɣ, ma iqesd-iken-id, ɣas rewlet fell-as, mulac ad ken yesɛeẓẓeg. Wagi ma ulac akk.

Yiwen n wass n yebrir deg tmurt n Leqbayel, ruḥeɣ ar tesdawit ad waliɣ tamdakkelt-iw. Tafsut tesken-d udem-is, igenni d azegzaw, lqaɛa am tfelwit yesbeɣ unazur.
Tanzayt n wass neqqim deg tɣiIust, nekk d kra n yikamaraden n yifer aẓelmaḍ ɣer tama n tesdawit. Nezzi-d ɣef ṭṭabla nettqessir ɣef tsertit, mi d-yekcem usentel n tayri, yezzi-d ɣur-i yiwen n ukamarad yenna-d: tayri ilaq ad tili d tagrawliwt. Tilifun yessawel-d, ul ineddeh-d, ǧǧiɣ imdukal ur nessuli ameslay, ur zeggneɣ lkas-iw n lqahwa.

Arseṭ
Arseṭ d tikciwin i d-yettilin deg tuget n tagniwin s yini awṛaɣ imalen ar temlel, yettmag-d s usrag n wazzugen d yigam.[1] D ayen yettwassnen d akken tawaffsa d usemnenni n werseṭ deg yideggan yettwallsen am izeṭṭiwen imedlen ixeddem-d uffuɣ (aɛekkur)
Arseṭ d win ilan (yesɛan) tissi meẓẓiyen n umazzal amarkanti s upṛutin isem-is amazzal n werseṭ d kra n tebrurin timellalin i d-yettmagen s lmend n waffal di tfekka
Gar n waṭṭanen yettenfufuden s usrag n yigem n werseṭ gan d iramanen d wazzug n yiɣsan.[2]

« Aɣlif n Usegmi aɣelnaw yesselɣa akk imazwaren ilelliyen ara yettekkin deg yikayaden n Lbak akked win n taggara n ulmud n uɣerbaz alemmas n useggas n 2022 dakken ldin sin yismal-a : https://bac.onec.dz https://bem.onec.dz
Aya, seg usinas (ttlata) 01 furar alamma d ass n usinas (ttlat) 15 furar 2022, akken ad ssiwḍen ad skeyden tiseddi n telɣutin-nsen tudmawanin, ladɣa isem akked uzarisem, azemz akked udeg n tlalit », i yesseddi ulɣu.
« Ma llant tucḍiwin, yessefk ɣef yimazwaren ad sselɣun s tira tamehla n Usegmi deg wayen yerzan iseɣtiyen ara neg », i yezmel ulɣu.
Yettwaseddi-d dakken « mi ara tekfu tenzagt, ad ddmen yimazwaren akk tamasit n tuccḍiwin ur nettwaseɣti ara deg tenzagt yettwasebḍen ».

Lʼinjil ɣares ṯnayen n yisemawen, qqaren-as Lʼinjil qqaren-as ƹaweḏ Ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ. Lʼinjil ḏayes 27 n ssuraṯ. Ssura wis xemsa yuri-t Siḏna Luqa u qqaren-as Ȓexḏayem n Arrusul. Ṯtarjem ḏanita s ṯmaziɣṯ n Arrif, iƹni ṯarifiṯ (ssura wis ṯȓaṯa yuri-t ƹaweḏ Siḏna Luqa). Min iƹna Siḏna Luqa? Netta ḏ ijjen zi ȓmuminin imezwura n Siḏna Ƹisa. Netta ḏ aḍbib ḏ ameddukeȓ n arrasul Bulus, itsafar akiḏes ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes. Aṭṭas zi min iweqƹen ḏi ssura-ya iwqeƹ-asen ƹaweḏ i Siḏna Luqa ḏ arrasul Bulus. Ḏi Ȓexḏayem n Arrusul itƹawaḏ min ḏasen iweqƹen i ȓmuminin imezwura ig yumnen zi Siḏna Ƹisa zi ssin aȓ ṯsawent menbaƹd i wami d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ itwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna. Ḏi lʼayaṯ iy d yusin ȓexxu a nẓer min iweqƹen jar Siḏna Ƹisa ḏ imeḥḍaren nnes wami itwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna zzaṯ nsen. Ṯessawaȓ xas ssura-ya ḏeg wuḏem wis 1 zi lʼaya 8 aȓ 11: Maca axmi xawem ɣa d ihwa Arruḥ iqeddsen, aɣarwem yiȓi jjehḏ. Axafi ṯcehḏem ḏi ṯendint n Lquds ḏ marra ṯamurṯ n Yahuḏiya ḏ Samarya aȓ ṭṭarf n ddunect." Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa awaȓ nnes, itwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna. Qqimen xezzaren ḏayes, iweddar-asen ḏeg useynu. Qqimen xezzaren mliḥ wami yuȓi ɣar ujenna, ƹlaɣafla ufin ṯnayen iṯarrasen bedden akiḏsen ɣarsen arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ. Nnan-asen: "Ay iwḏan n ṯmurṯ n Ljalil, mayemmi ḏa ṯbeddem ṯxezzarem ɣar ujenna? Ƹisa wanita iy ḏawem itwarfƹen ɣar ujenna, amecnaw mammec ṯeẓrim yuȓi ɣar ujenna, amenni iy d ɣa yas." Ɣer niɣ ṣenneṭ swadday i wawaȓen nneɣnit n Arebbi iy d yusin ḏi Ȓexḏayem n Arrusul.

Deg wussan ineggura, truḥ yiwet n tesqamut n yimeḍebbren n tɣiwant n Bni Dwala, gar-asen lmir mass Mustapha Hadef, ɣer temdint n Blanc Mesnil, deg Fransa. Din, aqerru n tɣiwant-agi, mass Dedier Mignot, yesterḥeb yes-sen. Dɣa, ad yili usemmi n yiwen n ubrid s yisem n Bni Dwala. Aya deg yiwen n lufeq n lemɛawna neɣ ayen iwumi neqqar le protocole de jumelage i d-ttwastenyan deg useggas n 2003. Lewfeq-agi d win i icerken snat n temdinin deg yiḥricen n yidles, addal d win n temtti. Ad d-nerr lewelha belli imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Blanc Mesnil, azal n 54000, gar-asen 10% n tmurt n tefriqt n ugafa. Ad d-nesmekti belli yiwet n tesqamut n temdint n Blanc Mesnil tusa-d deg useggas yezrin ɣer Bni Dwala. Si tama-nniḍen, yella-d yiwen n usenfar iwmi seman “Taddart n umaḍal” deg temdint n Blanc Mesnil anda kkin 6 yinelmaden n tɣiwant n Bni Dwala, sin deg-sen n tesnawit, 4 n uḥric alemmas. Gar yinalmaden i yellan deg “Taddart n umaḍal” 6 tmurt n l’Ethiopie, 6 n Legliz, 6 n Russ, 6 n Fransa.
Dalila I.

Ṣenneṭ i ȓebƹaḏ n lʼayaṯ zi ssura umi qqaren Imezwura zeg wuḏem wis 37 aȓ 50. Ṯessawaȓ x ȓiyyam n Siḏna Yusef, ṯtarjem ḏanita s ṯmaziɣṯ n Arrif, iƹni ṯarifiṯ.
Ɣer ḏanita x ṯirja n Siḏna Yusef iy yurja x ayṯmas ḏ babas ḏ yemmas. Manaya aqaṯ ḏeg wuḏem wis 37 zi lʼaya 1 aȓ 11: Tuɣa Siḏna Yaƹqub izḏeɣ ḏi ṯmurṯ n Kanƹan mani immuṯ babas Isḥaq ḏ jeddes Siḏna Brahim. U Siḏna Yaƹqub tuɣa ɣares arbeƹa n ṯemɣarin ḏ ṯenƹac n iḥenjiren.
Yusef, ḏ ijjen zeg iḥenjiren nnes, wami tuɣa ɣares sbaƹṭac n iseggwusa 
... (76 chars skipped) ... 
awaḏ xasen ȓexbar war iḥȓin i babas.
Tuɣa Siḏna Yaƹqub iƹizz xas Yusef aṭṭas x marra iḥenjiren nnes minzi netta ḏ mmis amezwaru n ṯemɣarṯ xas iƹizzen, u manaya iy ṯ ijjin yuca-as ṯaqmijat ḏ jḏiḏ. Nhar wami ẓrin Yusef iƹizz aṭṭas x babas, carhen-ṯ uca tuɣa war zemmaren akiḏes ssiwȓen s wawaȓ iṣebḥan.
Ij umur Yusef yurja ij n ṯerjiṯ, u iƹaweḏ-it i ayṯmas, uca rennin carhen-ṯ ktar. Netta inna-asen: "Sḥessem ɣari. Qa ṯarjiṯ-a iy urjiɣ: Ẓriɣ axmi neccin netcedda ṯiqeṯnin n imendi ḏeg yiyer. Cway cway
... (76 chars skipped) ...
t-as."
Nnan-as ayṯmas: "Ma ṯfekkareḏ cek axaneɣ ṯḥekmeḏ?" Uca rennin ƹaḏ carhen-ṯ ƹlaḥsab n ṯerjiṯ nnes ḏ wawaȓen nnes.
Yurja ƹaweḏ ij n ṯerjiṯ nneḍnit, iƹaweḏ-it i ayṯmas, inna-asen: "Nec urjiɣ ij n ṯerjiṯ axmi ṯfuct ḏ ṯziri ḏ ḥiṭac n yiṯran marra iḏsen sejjḏen-ayi." Umbaƹd iƹaweḏ-it i babas ḏ ayṯmas marra. Inna-as babas: "Mana ṯarjiṯ-a iy ṯurjiḏ? Ma tfekkareḏ s ṯiḏet nec ḏ yemmac ḏ ayṯmac aɣarek d nas bac aḏac nsejjeḏ?" Uca ḥesḏen-ṯ ayṯmas aṭṭas x manaya, maca babas iqqim itfekkar ḏi manawiya.

Tamacahut n 7 twuYa neY rradmat uqmen warrac iqeswaḥen d-yesker umeskar Wilhelm Busch s tutlayt talmanit. Yesseẓreg-itt-id ass n 04.04.1865.
Segmi s isefra i tt-yura Wilhelm Busch, aṭas n yinzan yettwaseqdacen ass-a di tutlayt talmanit ttwakksen-d dYa seg-s tmacahut-agi. Ulac axxam, timkerḍit, aYerbaz neY ayen-nniḍen ideg ur yettaf ara wemdan adlis-is di tmurt n Lalman.
Tettwasmuḥeyt-d s ugar n 300 tmeslayin.
Segmi tt-walaY ula d nekk d tamacahut s wazal-is, smuḥyeteY-tt-id Yer tutlayt-nneY, acku ssarmeY-asen-tt i warrac d tullas-nneY, riY ad tt-Yren xerṣum d nutni, Yas ulamma d tamacahut ara sen-ieeğben ula i yemYaren, lemmer d widak yettaran lewhi-nsen Yer temsal yettaken anzi Yer tigi.
Aṭas n wagguren aya tura seg wasmi d-ssuffYeY adlis-agi, maca, arrac d tullas ur zemmren ara ad t-aYen, ma d imawlan-nsen ur d-lhin ara d waya.
Atan ihi wedlis-agi d tunṭict i kenwi (kennemti) ay arrac d tullas-nneY, SsarameY akka tura ad ken-in-yaweḍ!
Seid At Meemmer

Meyyez ɣef liḥala-yagi: Mi gwala Kamal sin yemdukkal-is la d-ţqerriben ɣur-es, yebda iḥebbek wul-is. Smana-yagi kan, snat n tikkal i eerḍen a t-demmren ad ikeyyef dduxxan. Atnan daɣen uɣalen-d almi d ɣur-es.
Amezwaru deg-sen yenna-yas:
“Mazal-ik weḥd-ek? A k-d-ssekneɣ yiwen wemdakkel.”
Mi d-inna “amdakkel”, iɣmez-as, yessufeɣ-ed si lǧib-is yiwet n lḥaǧa yefka-ţ i Kamal.
Kamal iwala ageṛṛu ger iḍudan n werfiq-is. Dɣa ul-is yerna iḥebbek akteṛ.

Tiɣirdemt
Tiɣirdemt (Asget: Tiɣirdmiwin), (Assaɣ usnan: Scorpiones) d tafesna n iɣersiwen armtegziten yeṭṭafaren asmil n tessisiyin, yla (isɛa) 8 n iṭarren u yettidir deg yidgan iẓeɣlen yakkawen yetteffer deg urzuten n tṛesyaf i wakken ad yerwel ɣef tfukt n tniri. Llan wazal n 2000 n telmas n tɣerdmiwin deg umadal, Azal ameqran n tɣirdmiwin d tuɣsiwin acku tisiqqest-is tettili-d deg taggara n wedfar-is
Tarrawt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tudert d wansayen[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Llan-t snat n telmas n tɣirdmiwin

Deg wussan-agi kan iɛeddan, i d-yeffeɣ ɣer ssuq udlis wis tlata n umaru d umedyaz Muḥemmed Ḥaǧimi, iwummi isemma Iles, times. D ammud n tmedyazt wis kraḍ, i d-yessuffeɣ ɣer tezrigin n Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin n Tizi Uzzu. Yettnuzu s wazal n 150 DA. D taselmadt n tmaziɣt Belḥusin Nasiṛa, i d as-yerran tazwert n udlis-agi n 48 n yisebtar. D ammud n tmedyazt, ideg ara naf 21 d asefru s teqbaylit timserreḥt, yeččuren d sser d ccbaḥa akked wawal aziḍan. Yettleqqim tamussni-s deg yisefra s wawalen iqburen, yessefruy s teqbaylit-nni taqurant. Ma d isental iɣef i d-yewwi awal deg wammud-agi, mačči yiwen, mačči sin, gten. Tuget n yisefra-s, tezzin ɣef tnagit n tegrawla tazzayrit (Awal n umeɣras), tamagit d yidles amaziɣ (Asmekti n tefsut), tayri (Tayri ifuḥen, Tajeǧǧigt n ddunit, Ansayen n tayri)…atg.
Nger tamawt deg yisefra-agi, nufa-d belli Mass Ḥaǧimi, yessefray s 6 n yifyar i yal taseddart, ma tameɣurt i d-yettuɣalen deg yisefra-a d AB/AB/AB. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, Mass Ḥaǧimi Muḥemmed, d amedyaz d amaru. Yettales-d diɣ timucuha i warrac, am wakken diɣ i yettaru timezgunin sya ɣer da. D argaz bu tebɣest meqqren, ulamma 79 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is maca mazal deg-s ifadden d leḥrara n uxeddim ɣef yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt. Ilul ass n 15 deg cutember 1941 deg taddart n Cender deg tɣiwant n Naṣirya deg lwilaya n Bumerdas.
A. A.

Akitu, niɣ ixf n useggas n ibabilen d iyacuren, d netta i yellan d lɛid aqdim qeɛ deg umezruy n yewdan. Ttbeddan ɣer-s ɣer nhar-a ɛad deg umezwaru n abril di mkul aseggas.
Deg wemkan-nni i umi qqaren Lqeḥṭaniya di tendint n Lḥasaka ḍarreɛ n Surya, ttbeddan iyacuren ɣer lɛid-a, ferrḥen zeg-s, ttirḍen ij n weklasi n warruḍ-nsen, ceṭṭḥen, ḥuma a dd-snewjwen aseggas-nsen amaynu i yiwḍen ɣer 6771 s tteqwim-nsen.

ɣer tudert, amen dd-ittɛaqqab uɛeqqa ɣer tmurt xmi dd-iɣemmi zi jjdid, s twasit n tefsut, d ugama i ideḥḥan d amaynu.
Ɛlaḥsab Encyclopædia Britannica, akitu di tɣerma tababilit ttuɣa-t d ij n lɛid n taẓẓut d tsessawt.

jer yewdan. Ad tewqeɛ lfuḍa d arrwina di Babil, ar ass n 1 zi abril, xenni i ɣa afen ajellid, ad tkumasa lefraḥet d ccḍiḥ… Axerriq n abril ssa i dd-yekka, yeqqar belli ajellid wer iwedder ca nican, d asniɛmel waha! ».

Asmi yella Eisa di lqaea, yesea yiwen wemdakkel isem-is Ileazar (Laeẓar) izedɣen di temdint n Bit-Ḥananya, tama n Yarucalim. Yiwen wass, amdakkel-agi-ines yemmut, yerna Eisa ur d-iwwiḍ ɣer Bit-Ḥananya armi eeddan ṛbee eyyam. Iṛuḥ ɣer uẓekka neţţa d Meryem akk-d Marta, tiyessetmatin n Ileazar. Din din nnejmaeen-d lɣaci. Xayel kan acḥal i feṛḥent Marta d Meryem m’akken i d-yesseḥya Eisa gma-tsent!—Γer Yuḥenna 11:21-24,38-44.
Yuɣ lḥal Marta tella tessen lexbaṛ yessefṛaḥen yeenan lmeggtin. Teelem be
... (478 chars skipped) ... 
ḥḥin medden di tmes m’ara mmten? Imi Adlis Iqedsen ibeggen-ed belli lmeggtin ur ẓrin acemma, aselmed i d-yeqqaren belli wid yemmuten ţţeneeţţaben di tmes d lekdeb i gessamasen isem n Ṛebbi. Aeeţţeb di tmes d ayen ur s-nelli ara yakk deg wul i Ṛebbi.—Γer Irmiya 7:31.
3. Lmeggtin zemren a ɣ-d-hedṛen?
Lmeggtin ur sellen ur heddṛen. (Ahellil 115:17) Lameena kra n lmalayekkat, yellan ţ-ţimcumin, ţţarrant iman-nsent amzun d imdanen i gemmuten, i d-iheddṛen tikwal i medden. (2 Buṭrus 2:4) Yahwa iḥeṛṛem
... (478 chars skipped) ...
enna 5:28, 29.
5. D acu i ɣ-isselmad ḥeggu n lmeggtin ɣef Yahwa?
Yella usirem n ḥeggu n lmeggtin axaṭer Ṛebbi iceggee-ed Mmi-s akken ad yemmet ɣef ddemma-nneɣ. Ihi, ḥeggu isselmad-aɣ aṭas ɣef leḥmala akk-d nneema (lemzeyya) n Ṛebbi. Anwa i k-yellan deg wul a t-teẓreḍ asm’ara d-ḥyun wid yemmuten?—Γer Yuḥenna 3:16;Iṛumaniyen 6:23.

‘’Timɣunin iweǧden d tin n Blida, Qsenṭina, Skikda, Ɛennaba, Tabatent akked Werregla, war ma nettu asfaylu n usnefli n Clef. 20 n Temɣunin nniḍen, ideg tella tin n Yilizi (Anẓul) akked Galma (agemmuḍ) ur ttɛeṭṭilent ara ad lalent’’, i d-yenna i Tnegga n APS unmazult 1 n uselway n temṣukt Tafidiralit, Nacer Rouibah.
Tafidiralit, d-ilulen melmi kan, yewweḍ wayyur segmi d tlul tessuddes-d 20 n temliliyin deg wakk akal n tmurt akken ad tesseddu taẓuri-a, asmuken akked useɣnew n yiqusisen n Temɣunin n twilayin n waykidu, s ucrak n tmehliwin timnaḍanin n tmeḍra akked waddalen.

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Ajiniral ameqqran, Saïd Chanegriha, aɣella s leɛḍil n yifesyanen n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant, yezzireg-d ass n ukras (larebɛa), deg yiwet n tirzi n umahil akked usekyed deg Temnaḍt taredsant tamezwarut, dakken agzum n tdawsa taredsant, s yisbiṭaren-is akked temṣukin n tdawsa heyyan i wakken ad yallel, ma tḥettem teswiɛt, anagraw adawsan aɣelnaw n tmurt deg ukatar n umennuɣ mgal n waṭan n unfafad Covid-19.
« Ad zzirgeɣ dakken agzum n tdawsa taredsant, s yisbiṭaren-is akked te
... (201 chars skipped) ... 
zifen deg usefrek n tezɣan akked twaɣiwin tigamanin i tedder tmurt-nneɣ, amedya n znezla n Leṣnam akked Bumerdas, akked uḥemmal n Bab Lwad, yerna taɣellist tadawsant d aḥric seg agensi seg tɣellist tanagdudt deg unamek-is hrawen », i d-yesseddi Ujiniral ameqqran Chanegriha, deg tirzi-s iga i Usbiṭar alemmas n Tredsa « Docteur Mohamed Seghir Nekache » deg Ɛin Nneɛǧa (agezdu n Lezzayer).
Deg tirzi-a, aɣella s leɛḍil n yifesyanen n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant yedla ɣef yikaten i bdan la ttgen yiḥric
... (201 chars skipped) ...
ulɣu n uɣlif n Temḥaddit taɣelnawt.
Ajiniral ameqqran Chanegriha, iga timlilit akked yikataren akked yimehhalen n Usbiṭar Alemmas n Tredsa, ladɣa imsujiyen akked tefremliyin, ifureṣ tagnit i wakken « ad ten-isnemmer ɣef wussisen-nsen i gan seg wul seg-mi i yebda waṭan-a amihaw« .
Tirzi n umahil akked uswaḍ ɣer Temnaḍt taredsan tamezwarut deg Blida n Ujiniral ameqqran ters deg ukatar n uḍfar, deg wannar, n uswir n useddu n yikaten yettwaddmen i umennuɣ mgal n unfafad Covid-19, i d-yenna ulɣu.

Deg wawal-nnes deg tezwara n Unmager ɣef Usefti deg Tkerrazt d Temguri n Tuččit ay yettwassuddsen deg Wammas Agraɣlan n Yisaragen deg Lezzayer, yerra Mass Djerad tajmilt i yimkerrazen.
« Nwala akk amek ay derwen yimkerrazen acqirrew n umennuɣ mgal tkaɣreft s uḍman n yifarisen ikerrazanen umasanen. Imkerrazen-nneɣ qublen tagnit s usigeẓ n wulzuzen iɣelnawen s tnectiwin ara d-iqamen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uneɣlaf amenzu ay yesselwin arẓam n unmager-a.
« Ula ma llant-d tegnatin d tisurfanin, maca nessaweḍ, s udraw n wakk imsemhal deg tɣult-a, ad d-nesseḍru mennaw n yiksaben », ɣef wakken ay d-yerna.
Yesmekti-d i lmend n waya dakken agzum n tkerrazt yedrew s wugar 12% deg ufaris anusem agensi s ufares n 25 n yimelyaṛen n yidulaṛen deg 2020, deg wakud aydeg yedrew-d s 23 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen deg 2019, am wakken ay d-yerna dakken takerrazt tessemras srid 2,5 n yimelyunen n yimdanen.

Yeldi-d useggas amaynut tibbura-s s wudem ur rǧin Yizzayriyen. Leɣla, ticcumert d lḥers si yal tama. Aya, mebla leɛḍil, yefka tagnit i ccwal d usuɣu. Ass n larebɛa tameddit, d ilmeẓyen n Bab El Oued i d-yefɣen s iberdan ttuɣun, ttruẓun, ugin ad qeblen tudert ideg ttemxelbaḍen.
Lexbar yuzzar, imi segmi akka yella uɛeqqa yessawalen, kra ur yeffir. D Wehran iɣer telḥeq tyita. Ziɣ imdanen rsen ɣef yirij, sami-t ad yenkikez. Yekker wahruḥu, almi iɣallen n laman ur as-ufin tabburt. Ulamek ara tessusme
... (236 chars skipped) ... 
amurt n Leqbayel i d-yekkren, uɣen-tt mkemda. Am wakken ziɣ, Leqbayel d « les marionnettes » gar yifassen n tmura tiberraniyin.
Taluft tis-snat, d tin yerzan tamentilt n tnekra-agi. Ayadra, amek yaɛaǧaba almi tewweḍ s aɛebbuḍ i kkren medden, ttun akk laẓ n uqerru ? Iqbayliyen, ẓran sani i tetteddu acḥal aya. D acu kan, tiɣri nsen ur tufi ara tamezzuɣt anda nniḍen, ugaden amer sxedmen-èten iberraniyen. Segmi i d-tekker yemma-s n ddunit, Aqbayli yettnaɣ mgal aberrani, tura ad yanez kan akka, ad d-
... (236 chars skipped) ...
iren ur ssawlen ara i yisertiyen, d yimusnawen. Lameɛna, rran tama n lecyax n leǧwameɛ, ad d-sersen lehna s rruqia. Cwiṭ n swab maḍi maḍi, si melmi « le discours moralisateur » yefra tilufa n tudrin neɣ ahat n tmurt s timmad-is ? Yerna, iban am yiṭij. Fɣen-d si lǧameɛ, tendeh lgirra. Ata-h, sanda tessawaḍ tiɣert n uqerruy. Limer d imusnawen i ikecmen annar, d lmuḥal ad d-yeḍru ubaxix. Maca, mi ara tɣab tmusni, iban d acu ara yeṭṭfen amkan-is.
Awidukan, imi faqen yimdanen, nekni nwulef !
Sylia. M

TUVIRETT (Tamurt) – B. Ɛebdennur zedɣeɣ di tɣiwant n Hizeṛ di Tubiret, aseggas-a iwid agerdas Master di tesnilest tamaziɣt si tesdawit n Tubiret. Ilindi iteka di temsizelt taɣelnawt n yiselmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu n tmaziɣt i useggas aɣurbiz 2016/2017 deg waɣir n Sidi Belɛebbas. Maca, ur ɛedda ara, mačči imi ur yiwwiḍ ara aswir ilaqen, d imukan i drus yerna aṭas n yilmeẓyen Iqbayliyen i yekkin dinna, daya imi id yeɣli d amezwaru deg umuɣ n uraju (1er de la liste d’attente).

Ɛebdessamad Zeryuḥi
Twalat tamzwarut taffen tifettusin n mikruplastik deg idammen n bnadem. Twafit-a wer dd-tussi ca mebla leḥsab. Maca d ij n usurif d ameqqran ɣer zzat deg iger n tussna-ya. D manaya i nnan imrezuten Ihulandiyen zi tesdawit n Amsterdam.
Imussnawen ufin tifettusin-a n mikruplastik di 75 zi 100 n imecrak n trezut-a. Imussnawen fettcen deg idammen n 22 n yewdan. Ufin tifettusin n plastik di 17 zeg-sen.

Aqarri di sseḥet
Mkul ijj zeg yewdan‑a cḥal deg‑s ufin n mikruplastik d ddab n plastik. Rux ad rzun mecḥal n lweqt i ttɣimant tfettusin-a n plastik di rrimet.
Mala ttɣimant ij n lweqt d tameqqrant di rrimet, rezzun ad ssnen mani tnegrawent d mamek i ɣa qarrent di sseḥet awarni ij n lweqt tazzirat. Ufin deg imuddar beli tifettusin-a n plastik tnegrawent‑asen di tarut d wadan.
Lhawa
Qqaren imussnawen belli mikruplastik wer nzemmer a zeg-s nerwel, ḥuma wer daneɣ ittidef ɣer rrimet.
Manaya d ij n u
... (236 chars skipped) ...
ett (tsunta) niɣ dduli n qama, taɛɛejajt-nni zeg-s i dd‑itteffɣen teccur s mikruplastik.
Mikruplastik ɛawed izemmer ad itwakkes zeg ijartal, arrud, tizeyyatin n isegman xmini ttiḥmant, niɣ tizzeyatin i zi nsess aman.
Suyeni qqaren immarzuten belli aman n tsebbalt ḥsen zeg yenni n tziyat. Tizeyatin n waman deg-sent aṭṭas n mikruplastik am macca i yellan di lpakiyet n plastik.
Qqaren ɛawed beli macca i ɣa ɛeḍlen temmars x ttabla, ittxesa ad t‑ttwadel ḥuma mikruplastik wer x-as ittrus.

Tassast
Tassast deg tesnimant d afray (aḥulfu) s utmelli d wadad d tuẓẓma. Dɣa isekna n tassast mgaraden neɣ ugten seg s ufray s temzalt (ṛṛwaḥ) n tezmert, afray s uneẓmi, antuter amatu, turnant, tunɣayt, Tawarrẓa, alluy d uɣelluy n wadad n yidammen, arfey, Anfa, imrayen deg unagraw amaẓẓad, yakk d yiẓmi yakked d isekna n tarda ɣer tullas. Yerna tassast tezmer ad teglu i wemdan s wuguren niden meqqren am wuguren n wul neɣ s yifrayen ur nelhi ara ɣef yiman-is.
Tudert n wemdan d tin i d-issuturen drus n tassast, acku anecta d ayen yelhan i tezmert. Anda i tettallel deg usgirrez n tmellit tanaddalt, akken i tga d amgi aseraɣ i ttaǧǧan amdan ad yessezgi w ad yennam tawennaṭ-is.

TAMURT TAQVAYLIT (SIWEL) — Tultya n wannar s yisem urgaz d umeɣnas ameqqran n tmurt Taqvaylit Maeṭub Lwennas, di taddart n Tiɣilt n Mexluf i d-yezgan di tama n Uqvu, dayen i yernan iseɣ d wazal i yimezdaɣ n tama-ayi irefden isem n Maeṭub Lwennas, s yisem-is d azamul n umennuɣ ɣef tlelli d tnekkit n tmurt Taqvaylit d tmazɣa s umata.
Tulya n wannar Maeṭub Lwennas, tella-d s tekkin n yimezdaɣ d yimeɣnasen nniḍen am Ɛevd Slam Ɛevdnur. Rnu ɣur-s, ayen i yernan cvaḥa i tadaynt i d-yellan deg taddart n Tiɣilt n Mexluf, d anayen aqvayli d umaziɣ irefden imezdaɣ s tfenṭaẓit deg umkan n tedyant.
D amedya i tudrin nniḍen n tmurt Taqvaylit ad ḍefrent avrid n taddart n Tiɣilt Mexluf, ad refden izumal n tmurt Taqvaylit deg leqdicat i yecvan wiyi akken ad qqimen deg cfawat yerna ad twaḥrazen i tsuta i d-iteddun.
SIWEL 130920 AVR 21

« Ur bɣiɣ ara ad geɣ abeddel aɣrud n Unabaḍ s tin n leqder i uɣref. Aql-aɣ ɣef umnaṛ n tefranin ara nessuddes deg sin neɣ kraḍ n wayyuren i d-iteddun », i d-yenna Uselway Tebboune deg temlilit akked yimasayen n yimidyaten iɣelnawen i d-yettwamsaken ass n uynas (letniyen.
Abeddel n unabaḍ ad yas dindin deffir n tefranin « akken ara d-yeffeɣ ugmuḍ n tefranin-a », i yerna yenna-d.
Mi d-yebder abeddel aɣlifan uzgin, yesmektid uselway n Tegduda dakken isers deg nnican kra n yigzumen, amedya n Teẓwert akked Temguri, igzumen-a, i d-yenna, ur d-fkin ara agmuḍ deg unnar, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan tameddurt tayalast n yiɣermanen.
Yemmeslay-d ɣef kra n yidis yelhan akked wid n dir deg wayen yerzan tigawt n Unabaḍ, Aselway Tebboune yebder-d semmus neɣ sḍis n yineɣlafen iɣef « uran ddegs n yimdanen, ladɣa imeẓla yerzan tuzzma-nsen ».
Iɛeggalen n Unabaḍ amezwaru ttwafranen-d « d tiririt i yisutren n umussu aɣerfan Lḥirak yettwabarken n tidet i la d-yeɣɣaren akken ad yili ubeddel asudan », i d-yenna uɣella n Uwanak.
Yenna-d ɣef tneqqiḍt-a, « ɛerḍeɣ ad serseɣ iqerra imuyna, rriɣ-d ɣef unmeqqen i d-fkiɣ s usersi n yilemẓiyen d ineɣlafen akked semmus n yineɣlafen i d-yekkan seg umussu aɣerfan n Lḥirak, amahil n kra yebda la d-yettak igumma deg wannar ».

Ass-a n tezrawt tessuddes-it Tiddukla n Umennuɣ Mgal Twuɣa Tinmettiyin n twilayt n Txencelt ɣer yidis n tiddukla n « Oxygene » i usmal n tmerrit tawennaḍant, yella-d deg tesnawit n Segueni-Sadek, yernu wekkden-d deg-s, yimedrawen, dakken « akk imeggiyen n tmetti taɣarimt yessefk ad mahlen akken ad d-afen tisemsedda timuyafin akk i umennuɣ mgal twuɣa tinmettiyin deg uɣerbaz ladɣa imi ay d-yelfa dakken akk ayen yettewgen i lmend n waya iban-d dakken ur yenfiɛ ara ».
« Aseqdec n tehyifin d ayen ay 
... (187 chars skipped) ... 
rdan n unegraw agelluyan n temsetla taɣelnawt n Txencelt, ay d-yefkan amedya n mennaw n temsal ayyes d-telha temsetla deg yiseggasen-a ineggura.
Yekcef-d daɣ ujudan-a dakken « ccil n tḥemliwin n usefrey ay gant tmehliwin yemgerraden, taddadanin sskanayent-d dakken aktamur n yiseqdacen n tehyufin deg uɣerbaz simal irennu akken ad yaweḍ aswir d aklisan ».
S waya, yebder-d tazrawt ay iga Usira Aɣelnaw n Umennuɣ Mgal Tehyufin ay d-yellan gar 17 d 21 Yebrir 2016 yernu d tin ay d-ikecfen dakken 54.000
... (187 chars skipped) ...
bat ay yessawaḍen inubiyen ad ɛerḍen neɣ ad ssudren tihyufin d anadi ɣef tufrayin timaynutin d uɛaned n yimeddukal-nsen.
I usmekti, ttwaferqent tuḍfisin i usefrey n yimezrawen n tesnatwit n Segueni-Sadek ɣef yimihiten n tehyufin deg yijifeṛ n wass-a n tezrawt aydeg ttekkan yigensasen n tmehliwin n umesten aɣarim, tawennaḍt, imeẓla isɣananen, asegmi, tabniqt n tmesliwt n Usira n Yiɣsuren n Yilemẓiyen, aɣsur anagdud n tdawsa tamadust n Txencelt d uɣsur anagdud n usefrek n wammasen n umḍal atwilan.

Yiwen seg yimtawayen-a d tasektayt n umsegzu i usnegmu n unmireg asindisan azzayri-aṭalyani yerzan tiṛmisin tilemmasin d tmecṭuḥin d temguriwin tilemmasin d tmecṭuḥin akked tesguri tucrikt n umennuɣ mgal usgufsu d usidrem n tremɣa, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uɣlif.
Aḍris-a yesskanay-d timeɣsiwt n uselway n tegduda akken « ad yeṭṭef deg yimirwen-nnes yerzan amennuɣ mgal usekki arusḍif n yidrimen d usuɣal n wayla ay yettwareɣmen ɣer uzɣar », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna ulɣu-a.
Amtawa niḍen yettwazemlen d tasektayt n umsegzu i unmireg deg ugzum n tmerrit d uneggaf n umtawa deg tɣult n yidles.
Tettwazmel daɣ tsektayt n umsegzu gar Sonatrach d teṛmist taṭalyanit n ENI deg tɣult n usnirem.
Seg yidis niḍen, yernu i lmend n usmuteg, deg Zzayer Tamaneɣt, n usuddes n Tqacuct Tagernabaḍt Tis 4 gar Zzayer d Ṭṭalyan ussan n 18 d 19 Yulyu 2022, gan-d tasguri ay zemlen uneɣlaf n yiweẓla iwerdaniyen d umɣiwan aɣelnaw deg uzɣar, Mass Ramtane Lamamra, d umtil-nnes aṭalyani, d tin aydeg sin-a n yinabaḍen wekkden-d timeɣsiwt tucrikt n usdusu n ublag-nsen asnuddsan d usdusu n wassaɣen gar Zzayer d Ṭṭalyan deg yigzumen uzwiranen.
